project_data.project_name: To Meet the Faces You Meet

campaign.story:
The LONG AWAITED THIRD SERIES!
And HERE IT IS! The SEQUEL SERIES to the SEQUEL SERIES!
First there was BASIL WOLVERTON: BARFLYZE ... Then came BASIL WOLVERTON II: WOLVERTON'S WOMEN. And NOW, here comes WOLVERTON SERIES THREE: MONTE WOLVERTON. Monte Wolverton is an incredibly talented artist who is not only carrying on the loopy, ugly, spaghetti monster style of his Dad, Basil, but is an artist in his own right who does fine art AND political cartooning. And Monte has been generous and encouraging and helpful every step of the way in this BRAND NEW card series celebrating the Wolverton Art Dynasty! And presented here is the visual 'photo tour' of this upcoming card series:
This series features a 54-card base set -- the entire Lena's Bambinas (daughters of the infamous LENA the HYENA ... go on, google that ... I'll wait. You'll recognize 'her' the moment you see her), the entire series of all 12 strange and twisted 'Twelve' fine art paintings, the entire suite of 'Eight Portraits of Things' PLUS more of Monte's fine art works. 
But WAIT, there's MORE! We're going to be doing a FULL MOTION lenticular card. Ever wonder what a Wolverton creation would look like if it actually ... MOVED? Scary thought, huh! Makes you fear for your safety, don't it! Well keep that fear alive -- because here comes that SCARY THOUGHT right to your eyeballs! In full motion lenticular good-ness!
Not enough for you? Well that's great because there's MORE! Through the generosity of Monte Wolverton and Grant Geissman we're creating a limited edition Kickstarter Exclusive fine art etching of a work created by both Basil Wolverton and Monte Wolverton. And it will be limited to backers of this Kickstarter. "Awww... only ONE etching? But I LIKE etching cards!" Well that's GREAT because there are FOUR limited edition etching cards planned for this card series! Am showing you ONE of the etchings but the other 3 are in the works so there will be a total of FOUR etching cards and master set backers will get all 4 of them ... limited edition and with matching edition numbers. 
The four different Monte Wolverton Etchings (artwork by Monte and Basil Wolverton, platework by RRParks)
STILL not enough for you? Fine then, BE greedy (card collectors SHOULD be greedy!) -- there is being created a very special METAL CARD. Limited edition and a Kickstarter Exclusive. let's just say in future generations when your kids or grandkids ask "anything happen in the year 2020?" this card will be horrifically relevant!
Oh come on now, STILL fiending for MORE WOLVERTON in this card series? Well that's super swell and peachy keen because we'll have genuine production PRINTING PLATES! These are UNIQUE -- there can only ever be ONE printing plate for each of the four colors that go into a trading card's production. And at the master set level you will GET one!
JUST ADDED! June 3rd! 
ALL Master Set Level backers will get a BONUS ITEM on top of everything else. No add-ons, no stretch goals, no extra cost. Those who have pledged, will pledge or who change their pledge from a lower level to the MASTER set level will get a FREE full metal Monte Wolverton Autograph card! Here's what it will look like (image below) and the number of autograph cards will be determined by the Master Backer number (so these are limited edition Kickstarter Exclusives). EACH Master Set will get one ... so those who pledge on one master set will get one... those who pledge on more than one will get an autograph card for EACH master set they pledge on.


Because I'm a fan of 1950s and 1960s trading cards and packaging, we're going to do something different with this Wolverton card series. There will be a 'header card' and it tops the 'Rack Pack' style packaging of this card series. I've designed it to have that 1950s through 1960s RETRO-STALGIC look of packaging. The Rack Pack will contain the complete base set and other non-exclusives ... while the exclusive cards will be outside the packaging. I want to capture and share the look and feel of going back in time and finding this card series at a 5 and 10 store's candy counter display ... and then the FUN of being 8 years old and tearing into this package of weird delights. 

Here are the pledge levels:
$1. For a BUCK you'll get ONE Wolverton Series Three promo card. 
$8. For $8 you will get ONE Wolverton Series Three promo card ... 3 base set cards ... and the LENTICULAR MOTION card.
$28. For $28 you will get the COMPLETE BASE SET of WOLVERTON SERIES THREE with the header card in the Rack Pack style packaging PLUS the promo card PLUS the lenticular card. 
$50. For $50 you will get the COMPLETE BASE SET of WOLVERTON SERIES THREE with the header card in the Rack Pack style packaging. PLUS the promo card. PLUS the lenticular motion card. PLUS all four limited edition Monte Wolverton Etching cards.
$68. THE MASTER SET. Here it is for you OCD maniacs (like me) who have to have it ALL! For $68 you will get the COMPLETE BASE SET of WOLVERTON SERIES THREE with the header card in the Rack Pack style packaging. PLUS the promo card. PLUS the lenticular motion card. PLUS all four limited edition Monte Wolverton Etching cards. PLUS the limited edition metal card. PLUS a genuine Wolverton printing plate used in the production of the base card set. PLUS ... some surprises! I like surprises ... and also like to give surprises.
$120 THE DOUBLE MASTER SET. At this level you get DOUBLE the Master Set stuff and DOUBLE the surprises.
ADD ONS:
Series One and Two:
So, you're all bummed out that you missed Wolverton Series 1 and 2, huh? You lay awake at night ... kicking yourself, pulling at your nose hairs ... "Why oh WHY didn't I get the first two series of Wolverton cards from RRParksCARDS?" Well if that's the WORST regret you have you certainly haven't done much with your life! But let's get rid of at least that ONE regret. You can ADD ON to your pledge and get BASIL WOLVERTON: BARFLIZE Trading Card Series (series 1) and/or BASIL WOLVERTON II: WOLVERTON'S WOMEN (series 2) ... EITHER of these two sets for $28 or BOTH for $50. Add that $50 on for BOTH and get BONUS promo cards for these two series AND ... yep, you guessed it, some SURPRISES, TOO!
The BARFLIZE FINE ART ETCHING SET!
Did you know, that right before I started RRParksCARDS Monte Wolverton and I did our very first project together? It was a limited edition suite of limited edition large-size (about 8x10" with 5x7" art area... each signed and numbered) hand crafted/pulled FINE ART ETCHINGS of Basil Wolverton's BARFLIZE (yes... we called the etching set 'Barflize' and the card set 'Barflyze' ... must have been a reason for that, but danged if I can recall what it was). All 36 of them WITH a special 'frontis plate' signed by Monte Wolverton (and me, as I did the etchings). This was limited to on 75 signed and numbered folio sets. I do not promote these much at all because I want the supply to last and go ONLY to true Wolverton fans. When i do list them for sale I list them at $360 ($10 each etching). But since if you've read this far along you are a Wolverton fan so ONLY during this Kickstarter, you can get one of the complete 36 (plus signed frontis plate) etching sets for a $250 add on. 
And THAT is our GRAND VISUAL TOUR of WOLVERTON SERIES THREE Trading Cards! 
IMPORTANT: Master Sets will be available ONLY during this limited time Kickstarter. Once the Kickstarter ends, the opportunity to get a MASTER SET ends at the same time. The limited edition etchings and metal cards will be based on the number of backers getting a Master Set (plus a set for me and a small number of contributors to the project). A base set MAY be available at a much later date on my website (but will cost more at that time ... Kickstarter prices are ALWAYS the lowest prices for sets). 
IMPORTANT: Customized Pledge Levels. Above are the pledge levels ... however, if there's a different combination of stuff that you want, just ask. Obviously ... material that is exclusive to this Kickstarter and to Master Sets can't be 'bought alone'. But if you wanted a Master Set plus an extra base set ... or if you wanted a base set of all 3 series PLUS a series 3 Master Set then sure -- we'll work that out. 
Questions? Just MESSAGE me. And by 'message' I don't mean 'comment'. A 'comment' is a public, well, COMMENT ... and as odd as this sounds, it is virtually impossible for me to see comments. But a message is a message ... it shows up as an email and is quite visible for me. I typically answer messages and respond to emails either same day or next day. You can send me an email through my RRParksCARDS.com website ... I'm also on Facebook as RICHARD PARKS or RRPARKS CARDS ... or in the Facebook group called 'Mystery Science Theater 3000 Trading Cards'. BEST way is to message through Kickstarter ... but any of these other ways will also be seen by me.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Risks? Well I suppose an asteroid could come hurtling through space and land on my head. Or a pandemic could sweep through the entire world and cause a slight delay in production (oh... wait a minute!) Otherwise, this is my 26th Kickstarter Campaign... and I've published dozens of other card series over the last 7 years (including eight different Three Stooges series, Gary Saves the Graveyard, two Basil Wolverton series, Japanese Horror in 3D, The 100th Anniversary of Zorro and others, MST3K Series one, two and three, Grim Reaper Series one, two and three, and others). I know my way around card publishing and financing production. Wolverton Series Three is nearly entirely designed and since Monte and I are the ONLY approval process 'chiefs', there will be zero delays for licensing approval 'big shots'. SOME graphics shown above may change but I don't anticipate much, if any, changes. So risks and challenges have all been minimized. At this moment, the printing company i want to use for production is very slow in turnaround and so I've set the anticipated release date of Wolverton Series Three as 'August'... this could change, of course, as we live in uncertain times with regards to business services. But anyone who has pledged on one of my Kickstarters knows the routine -- I keep everyone informed and do my best to release products on time (or nearly on time). None of that waiting around for YEARS to get your pledged stuff.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
MANOS: THE HANDS OF FATE Trading Card Series
Here it IS! And it only took 55 YEARS to happen! MANOS: The Hands of Fate Trading Card Series! MSTies had a sneak peek at some MANOS: The Hands of Fate  trading cards in MYSTERY SCIENCE THEATER 3000 Series Three  trading cards (a Riff It! subset) ... but now, here, finally -- a full card series with all the bells and whistles of the WORST MOVIE EVER MADE! Produced by Jackey Raye Neyman Jones (who played Debbie, the little girl in MANOS: The Hands of Fate  ) and RRParksCARDS Cards (who published MYSTERY SCIENCE THEATER 3000 Trading Cards Series One, Two and Three). And this is the Kickstarter campaign where you have your chance to FINALLY add the card series demanded by MILLIONS of fans across the world ... or perhaps just some really good fans here and there.
The current plan is to have the series released in June. Now, as we ALL know ... the entire earth is sort of in quarantine as a pandemic is sweeping across this section of the universe ... so the PLAN is a June release. The card series will actually be completed in just a few weeks and I'll keep everyone up to date on actual production. This Kickstarter, with all the exclusives, will run from March 24th through April 24th. During that time you can pledge and LOCK IN your card series and all exclusives.  
Here's  a visual 'grand tour' of the card series:     MANOS: The Hands of Fate Trading Card Series:
A 36-card BASE SET which tells the SHOCKING story of MANOS: The Hands of Fate ... where we meet Torgo, The Master, Debbie and her parents and all the other miserable souls. Cards are planned as old timey 18pt RETRO type cards similar to 1960s tracking cards. However! Jackey obtained permission for us to utilize the HIGH DEF imagery from the remastered version of the movie ... so no grainy, blurry 'vhs' sourcing -- these cards will have GLORIOUS images!
All 36 cards will be housed in 4 retro style card packs, each pack containing 12 different cards PLUS 1 sticker AND RRParksCARDS' first ever ANIMATED stick of FAKE GUM! OooOOoooo... it's HAUNTED, it's POSSESSED, YOU command the POWER to bring it to CREEPY LIFE -- it MOOOOVES! Si-i-i-ICK!
EACH 12-card pack will include ONE STICKER! There are currently 9 stickers planned for this card series. If you pledge on a single pack or 3 packs you will get 1 different sticker in each pack. If you pledge at the MASTER set level you will get ALL 9 STICKERS! [Note: Final sticker design may vary from what is shown... I'm still working on the sticker designs].
A VERY neat treat -- Specially produced ART CARDS of Manos-inspired paintings created by Jackey Raye Neyman Jones! Not sure how many different cards there may be in this set -- Jackey has 3 produced right now and because of this pandemic 'lock down' she's BOUND to have time to produce even MORE! IF she paints it, I will produce it and backers will GET SOME (Master set backers will get ALL of them!).
TWO DIFFERENT "TORGO MOTION" Lenticular cards ... he ambles, he gropes, he creeps you out and NOW he's doing all those things while you HOLD HIM in your HANDS! EwwwwwWWW!!! Two different cards are planned (already designed and ready for printing production). You get ONE Torgo Motion Lenticular card with a 3-pack pledge ... you get BOTH of them with a Master Set pledge!

I've been bringing aboard sketch card artists from Mystery Science Theater 3000 Trading Cards Series One, Two and Three -- Artists are currently still being invited (in fact, just now brought on MST3K Trading Card Artist Leon Braojos!) and others are still working on their masterpieces. Floydman, Philip Trujillo, Lindsey Armitage, and Jason Miller were able to make some scans of the cards they are working on... feast yer peepers on these shocking mini masterpieces above! Master Set backers will get one original MANOS: The Hands of Fate sketch card in their pledge!
OFFICIAL Sketch Card Blank! Those who pledge at the 3-pack level get ONE... those who pledge at the Master Set level get THREE (so hopefully Master Set backers will feel comfortable keeping one 'unsullied' in their collection and ALSO actually dust off their crayons or thick, stubby pencils and DRAW their OWN Manos Masterpiece for their collection!). 
Two BEAUTIFUL Metal Cards to collect! These will be limited edition, signed and numbered and available ONLY on Kickstarter! ONE random metal card for backers at the 3-pack level and BOTH metal cards for Master Set backers! Produced by those fine folks at Faerie Metal -- if you've enjoyed the MST3K metal trading cards you'll love these, too!
Okay, the PLAN is to have printing plates for Master Set backers ... the 'trick', though, is that the printing company has said they only MIGHT be able to provide printing plates (this is a company I've used before and they do a great job... but I've never ordered the printing plates from them before). So while I've been told 'probably yet' I can't guarantee it. But you know me by now if you've pledged on my Kickstarters for The Three Stooges, Zorro, Sharknado, Old Man Like Ron, Gary Saves the Graveyard, Mystery Science Theater 3000, Basil Wolverton, etc. that if something is even REMOTELY possible I do my best to move mountains to MAKE IT SO!
"What ELSE is included?"
Well I'll TELL YOU! A special KICKSTARTER BACKER ONLY promo card for SURE ... and I'm working on designing a special BLACK BUCKRAM bag for Master Set backers (3-pack or lower will have the cards in packs... master backers will have their cards in packs AND in the special Manos custom made 'red hand' buckram black drawstring bag). to house your card collection with a RED FELT 'Hand of MANOS' on the bag (see that photo above of all the cards laid out next to a black fabric drawstring bag? That's a mock up of what's being designed... so end product might not look EXACTLY like that, but gives you an idea). 
"Yea, okay... what ELSE you gonna do for us, huh?"
Not enough for you? Well okay ... at this time I'm working out logistics for creating MANOS ETCHING CARDS! If you've ever collected my Wolverton card series, Grim Reaper, Three Stooges or the Dance of Death series I did about 7 years ago (the first card series I did as RRParks CARDS) then you already KNOW what etching cards are. I believe I'm the ONLY publisher who creates genuine intaglio ETCHING cards! At least... for the MOMENT I am. And for this MANOS: The Hands of Fate Trading Card Series I'll be working out some challenges for the next couple weeks and will post an update or addition to this description once I work them out. 
"Yea, okay, that's all fine ... but what ELSE YOU GONNA DO FOR US???"
Ohhhhh you greedy little monkey! Good for you! Well I DO have one more item up my sleeve. STEVE VANCE! Yep -- Steve Vance who did ALL those Shout! Factory DVD mini posters, the DVD Mini Poster Art Subsets for Mystery Science Theater 3000 Trading Cards Series One, Two and Three PLUS the exclusive mini poster for Series Three? Well, he is RIGHT NOW working on an all original MANOS: The Hands of Fate mini movie poster! He's going to try and get me the pencil rough draft to me before I launch this Kickstarter but in ANY event ... SOON. The mini poster will be in the same style as the Shout! Factory DVD mini posters and the Mystery Science Theater 3000 Trading Cards Series Three box topper mini poster.
NOTE: Steve Vance JUST now (March 29 8:34pm) sent me his rough draft pencils for the Manos: The Hands of Fate mini movie poster art. Isn't this LOVELY -- and it includes 'Debbie' and her family, Torgo ... and, of course, The Master ... and... and what's that? Is that a 'cat fight', too??? Steve wanted to get this rough draft to me ASAP so all you Manos fans could see it in the early stages. 
PLUS I'm working on the idea given to me by TWO MSTies: special Faux Scratch 'n Sniff MANOS: The Hands of Fate Trading Card Series. I'm working on that right now so may adjust pledge level descriptions (but pledge level prices will NOT change even if I add in more cards, so no worries) once these very various variables are worked out. What I CAN say right now is that Master Set levels will be guaranteed whatever items I'm currently working out actually happen (Etching Cards, Mini Poster, Faux Scratch 'n Sniff, and any additional promo cards). It is my intention to create, with the generous help of Jackey Raye Neyman Jones, not just the first actual trading card series of Manos: The Hands of Fate but also the BEST POSSIBLE CARD SERIES for this movie that anyone could hope for. As most of you know, I wasn't given leave to produce Mystery Science Theater 3000 Series Four.  Bummer, I know, a lot of ideas 'left on the table' ... so MANOS: The Hands of Fate Trading Card Series is sort of an unofficial 'Series Four'... an epilogue card series to Mystery Science Theater 3000 Trading Cards. And since Manos: The Hands of Fate is so beloved by MSTies I think it is a fitting tribute to the show to include this movie as a stand-alone card series. I hope you agree!
PLEDGE LEVELS:
$1  Pledge = 1 promo card
$7  Pledge = 1 promo card PLUS 1 pack of 12 different cards. Not a complete set of course but fun for someone on a budget who simply wants to enjoy opening a pack of MANOS: The Hands of Fate Trading Card Series  and be part of the FUN! PLUS, of course, the weird and strange 'Manos Motion stick of fake gum'!
$30  Pledge = THREE PACKS of MANOS: The Hands of Fate Trading Card Series. Comes with 3 packs containing all 36 different cards, 3 different stickers, 1 METAL card, 1 Torgo Motion lenticular motion card,  1 Sketch card blank and some promo cards and, of course, the 'Manos Motion gum sticks', ONE special Jackey Art Card ... PLUS the Steve Vance Mini Movie poster for Manos: The Hands of Fate!
$66  Pledge = THE MASTER SET! Alrighty, here's what you get in the MASTER SET ... you get the 3 packs which will contain all 36 different base cards AND 3 different stickers. But you ALSO get BOTH Metal Cards, ONE original art sketch card, THREE official Sketch Card blanks, the Steve Vance Mini Movie poster for Manos: The Hands of Fate, all promo cards PLUS the exclusive Kickstarter campaign promo card, one genuine 1/1 unique printing plate, BOTH of the Torgo Motion Lenticular cards, 'Manos Motion animated fake gum sticks', COMPLETE set of all stickers, COMPLETE set of the special Jackey Art Cards. PLUS anything else that might be created for this series (such as the possible etching cards, Faux Scratch 'n Sniffs, etc.). Pledge at this level and you get everything! [66 limit]
$67 Pledge = THE MASTER SET ... on April 20th I did the math and am having to create an updated Master Set. The ONLY difference between this master set and the $66 one (despite the $1 difference just so I can tell them apart at the end of the campaign when doing paperwork) is that this master set doesn't have a printing plate. It has everything else, just not a printing plate (there's only so many printing plates possible). Everyone who came aboard the other master set level with the printing plate will get theirs... backers arriving NOW, though, I just won't have enough printing plates. BUT, you get everything else:  the 3 packs which will contain all 36 different base cards AND 3 different stickers. But you ALSO get BOTH Metal Cards, ONE original art sketch card, THREE official Sketch Card blanks, the Steve Vance Mini Movie poster for Manos: The Hands of Fate, all promo cards PLUS the exclusive Kickstarter campaign promo card, BOTH of the Torgo Motion Lenticular cards, 'Manos Motion animated fake gum sticks', COMPLETE set of all stickers, COMPLETE set of the special Jackey Art Cards. PLUS anything else that might be created for this series (such as the possible etching cards, Faux Scratch 'n Sniffs, etc.). 
$99 Pledge = THE MASTER SET + 1 Extra Sketch Card PLUS a surprise. So at this level you get EVERYTHING in the $66 pledge level (which includes a sketch card of course)... PLUS an additional sketch card ... PLUS a little surprise I'm cooking up (which MSTies will DEFINITELY approve of!). 
$100 Pledge = DOUBLE MASTER! Yep... as you rightly conclude, at this level you get the MASTER SET and everything that goes with it... only DOUBLE! So you can keep one and give the other as a gift... or hoard like a greedy, graspy ghoul until such time that it is worth a bazillion bucks and then ebay it. 
$180 Pledge = TWO full MASTER SETS (which includes 2 sketch cards) ... PLUS: TWO additional bonus sketch cards (for a total of FOUR sketch cards) ... PLUS: The sneaky secret surprise mentioned in the $99 level. 

SO  HOW DO I GET ALL THIS AMAZING STUFF AND SATIATE MY DIRE NEED FOR MANOS: The Hands of Fate Trading Card COLLECTIBLES???
It's  easy. You'll notice there are many different pledge levels listed above -- levels to fit all  collector budgets -- just pick which pledge level you like and on the right hand side of this screen you'll see the pledge levels to click on.

Questions  and Answers:
Q:  I want to get stuff, but I don't want to sign up to back on Kickstarter. How do  I go about it?  A:  Some collectors and fans don't want to sign up on Kickstarter (or CAN'T sign up on Kickstarter). If you are unable  to back through this Kickstarter just message me. We'll work it out, no  worries.
---------------
Q:  When will the MANOS Trading Card Series ship? A:  The current schedule and plan is to ship during June or early July. However, keep in mind... this series has a lot of moving parts and this pesky global pandemic quarantine has rather thrown delays into almost every aspect of human life. So you'll have to bear with me, please. I can certainly have everything designed (most likely designed even before this Kickstarter is over)... but whether or not ALL the printing companies involved in production are in motion again soon there COULD  be delays. I think June/July is a safe guesstimate. And, of course, will post updates to keep everyone informed about production 'stuff'.
---------------------
Q:  I'm OCD and want a set to keep sealed and a set to open. How do I back on two  base sets? Or two 'Master Sets'?  A: I've set up various pledge levels to satisfy most permutations of what most people might want. But you probably know me well enough by now that if you want some customized pledge level you message me (not 'comment', I don't get to see comments... but MESSAGE me). HOW does one message? Easy -- click to send me a note or message. If you pledge and have a question, click on your pledge and you'll see the clickable to contact me... or you cam message me through Facebook (my FB name is Richard Parks or RRParks CARDS or join the Mystery Science Theater 3000 Trading Card group and message me from there... or email me at RRParksCARDS@yahoo.com).  
-----------------
Q:  Why are you running this as a Kickstarter instead of selling at a comic shop or  through a catalog? A:  This is my 25th Kickstarter over the last 5 years. I've found that pre-selling a  card series on Kickstarter allows me to determine a proper production run of  cards and boxes (especially special production cards that are pricey to do ... such as metal cards). It also allows me to offer 'master sets' to collectors on a  limited basis. Once the Kickstarter is done I will have a good idea of what the  total 'sealed pack' needs will be for a production run to provide Kickstarter  backers. A Kickstarter also lets me get card series to serious  collectors FIRST before ANYONE else. AND to provide limited edition exclusives available NOWHERE else.  Plus a Kickstarter allows me to exercise  some flexibility on providing 'stuff' for backers.
Q: I've got a wart with a hair growing out of it. A: That's not a question. Might not even be a wart.
ADD ON GOODIES:
If you want something not listed just let me know and if it's possible we'll do it. Add On prices are postpaid in the US. If you're outside the US let me know before doing the add on so I can research postage costs to your country. And of course if you have any questions just ask! My goal is to make sure you have fun with your collection and it's everything you want it to be.  
MST3K ADD ONs!
 I've finally squared away all the 'MST3K Special Venue' items from last months' limited-time Special Venue ... I have some full boxes left (not many), some autograph cards left, and the original art of BYRON WINTON (first time available as individual pieces) and the Elisabetta Stoinich original art complete set. If you missed a MST3K series or just want to get another box or boxes, here they are:
And here are the LAST of the autograph cards:
Here are the Byron Winton ORIGINAL ARTWORK items:
Here is the complete original art set of Elisabetta Stoinich (not available individualy, ONLY available as a complete set... because if no one wants the complete set I'll keep them for my personal collection): 
I still also have a FEW odds and ends from the special venue (printing plate, Macarie and Character card error sets, 9up Puzzle Back printing plates, ULTIMATE progressive proof bundle, etc.) but MOST are all gone. If you want any of these MST3K shown here (or in the special venue -- see the MST3K Series 3 update for the special venue listings, listed February 29th as an UPDATE) just message me BEFORE changing your pledge on this Kickstarter. If what you want is still available you can then change your pledge amount and add on and I'll update the paperwork). If you have any questions, just let me know!
-----------------------
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Risks? Well I suppose an asteroid could come hurtling through space and land on my head. or a pandemic could sweep through the entire world and cause a slight delay in production (oh... wait a minute!) Otherwise, this is my 25th Kickstarter Campaign... and I've published dozens of other card series over the last 7 years (including eight different Three Stooges series, Gary Saves the Graveyard, two Basil Wolverton series, Japanese Horror in 3D, The 100th Anniversary of Zorro and others, MST3K Series one, two and three, Grim Reaper Series one, two and three, and others). I know my way around card publishing and financing production. Manos: The Hands of Fate is nearly entirely designed and since Jackey and I are the ONLY approval process 'chiefs', there will be zero delays for licensing approval 'big shots'. SOME graphics shown above may change but I don't anticipate much, if any, changes. So risks and challenges have all been minimized.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
In partnership with Topps, SideKick Lab is creating an all-new series of Mars Attacks trading cards right here on Kickstarter!  
The sequel to the 2015 Kickstarter-funded series 'Mars Attacks: Occupation', this set is designed to be enjoyed all on its own, or as part of the larger saga.  The set will begin with a 72 card base set with 18 all-new story cards by Ed Repka, William Skaar, Carlos Valenzuela, and Paolo Parente (that may expand to as many as 45 if we meet certain funding goals), special chase cards (including a "Mars Motors", a Mars  Attacks/Hot Rod mashup, and a sequel to the 2015 fan favorite crossover with Dinosaurs Attack!), autograph cards from contributing artists and legacy creators, sketch cards, and so much more!   
Below you will find a list of all components in the series that we'll start with, before we add more via stretch goals, as well as a guide on how you can choose the reward level right for you!   
Each hobby box will include 24 packs.  Each box will contain, in those packs, a full set of base cards, at least 10 chase cards, and a minimum of 12 parallel cards, as well as ONE guaranteed hand drawn original art sketch card and an additional super rare "hit" card (either a metal, 'Tobacco' card, or autograph).   
As the campaign progresses, the base set may increase in size, with new story cards, chase cards, and bonus items to be added as funding grows!
Future updates will give more info on the base set, chase cards, and super rare card types, and showcase the many kinds of exciting sketch cards! 
 In addition to the reward levels, you can customize your pledge with a variety of items to add on!  Simply total up the dollar value of what you'd like, and  add it to your pledge by clicking "manage my pledge."  After campaign, we'll send out a survey so you can tell us what you'd like to receive.  If you need help with adding items to your pledge, consult the "How to Pledge" infographic at the bottom of this page, and don't hesitate to ask us for assistance in the comments!   


List of sketch artists who have blank art cards in hand
 TM & © 2020 The Topps Company, Inc.  All rights reserved. MARS ATTACKS is a registered trademark of The Topps Company, Inc. and is officially licensed by The Topps Company, Inc.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
The team at SideKick (Tom & Adam) have managed, run, and fulfilled more than two dozen campaigns between them, including the 2015 Topps campaign for Mars Attacks: Occupation! 

In the 5 years since that campaign, we've gained more experience on much of what was new for us at the time, and are confident we can execute this product to the high standards expected by fans and collectors. 

Of course, wrinkles do and will arise, and not everything can be planned out this far ahead, so we are making best efforts to mitigate risk to ensure we deliver a set that is on time, and of the highest possible quality!

But whether issues arise or not, we plan to communicate to our backers throughout the entire process and update the status of our project in real time. We hope that in addition to reassuring you of our commitment to creating the best set possible, it will give you a unique insight into the behind-the-scenes making of the latest and most exciting Mars Attacks card series yet!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content: Lots of steps involved in just creating the hobby boxes!  First, they must be printed, of course. After printing, the first step was to foil stamp the MARS ATTACKS logo on every box, in a variety of colors based on reward levels.

Coming close to the finish line!  We've now received just about enough sketch cards and almost all the autographs needed to begin packaging up hobby boxes.  Your patience has allowed our artists to produce an incredible array of hand-drawn art cards.  Below are some of the latest that have been turned in.
Box printing is happening this week, the foil wrap is in hand, and all things are coming together!

As we package up boxes, and eventually orders, we hope to be able to share video of the process in action. You'll be able to watch our foil wrap machine seal packs, our die cutters cut boxes, our foil stamper stamp logos, and more!

Things are moving albeit slowly. We are still waiting on the last bunch of sketch cards, and artist autographs. For now, we are packaging what we can, but without all the sketch cards and autographs we cannot create hobby boxes, Mars Motors packs, Dinosaurs Attacks packs, Lucky Hit packs, or autograph fat packs. 
That said, the slow pace has given us opportunity to create some new bonus items. Extra, new cards, that nearly EVERYONE will receive FREE, including potentially a new, special hot pack!

Update time!
Blank autographs have been sent to artists. Some are overseas and may take some time complete and be returned. A total of 10 signers must be completed; some signers have to autograph hundreds of cards.
Sketch cards are also still coming back from more artists.  We do expect that we will have what we need in the next several weeks, but will still want to have a healthy amount of overage. We have 16 artists outstanding at this point.

updates.update_userinfo: AUTOGRAPH signers - Ed Repka, Will Skaar, Adam Levine, and more!
updates.update_content: Here's a look at some of the autograph cards, which should be mailed out to signers soon.

updates.update_userinfo: Progress Report, 3.22.21: Wrapping Packs and More...
updates.update_content:
For now we are doing whatever work we can, including wrapping packs that contain no hits: Mars Motors (Stickers Only), Dinosaurs Attack History (Cards Only), Promo Packs, Early Missions, and more!
We are die cutting collector boxes, collating sets, and mailing out autograph cards too.  When base set boxes are assembled we'll start packaging those up.
Only once we receive autographs back and enough sketch cards from artists we can start packaging boxes and packs that include those hits.

Just about all items have been printed. This week begins the process of putting sets together.  After being printed, stacks of 100 or more sheets are cut into individual cards.  When they come off the cutting machine they are boxed into stacks by card.  So a stack of 100-200 copies of each card.

But the stacks are not sequential, and come off randomly. So you might get a stack of card #1, then a stack of card #16, then #26, etc. There are three steps to putting together sets for packaging:
Watch as Mars Attacks: Uprising comes to life before your eyes!

updates.update_userinfo: Progress Report: Proof Printing 2/8/21 + Tattoo Update
updates.update_content: All proofing is complete!  We were able to review high quality proofs, discovering a few issues that needed correcting, and now TOMORROW, the set is scheduled to be fully printed!

Good news!  
This week, weather permitting, the printer will be creating the first set of proofs for approval before the full print run. We say 'weather permitting' because it was supposed to happen today, but has been tentatively pushed to Thursday due to a major winter storm.
How do Print Proofs Work?

campaign.story:
JAN 26th UPDATE: 10th Stretch Goal UNLOCKED! Every backer will receive in addition to the KILLER DUDES 2 set and Kickstarter Title Card; the Title Card Magnet, 4 Card Sticker Set to be voted on after the campaign ends, 5 parallel Alternate Look Cards, and 3 Final Girl Cards with their pledge at no extra cost! If you would like additional of any of these items, they're available as Add-ons. Message me for details.
===============
It's been a year since I released the 6th set. It's time to slay a 7th set of FACE CARDS.
If you're familiar with all of my previous FACE CARDS Kickstarter campaigns then you should know the quality and passion that I put into each trading card set. For those who are coming into this new, let me tell you what you'll expect...
My main objective with each Kickstarter campaign is to raise funds for the printing costs and cover shipping and Kickstarter fees. The majority of the cards have been created and are ready for press. I just need a little financial help to get the ball rolling.
By supporting, you'll get the basic KILLER DUDES 2 set PLUS EXCLUSIVE material (rewards) only offered here as a Kickstarter backer!
As before, I've opted for a 21 day fundraising period. Please share this with a horror fiend, a friend, and a fan who might also be interested in this collectible item.
Click to view ALL of the KILLER DUDES No. 2 cards
THE CARDS
Each basic 25 card set has 1 title card and 24 b&w KILLER DUDES 2 portrait cards.
Every backer will also receive 1 exclusive 'Kickstarter Funded' title card.
Every card has a detailed monstrous portrait on the front and revealing info about the character on the back. The info includes; character's name, actor, movie they were in, director, synopsis, trivia, and poster.
The sets do not contain any nudity and are considered "safe for work."
Only 500 sets will be produced, the title card will be signed and numbered, and each set will be in its own crystal clear 2 piece slider box.
There will be one character per film or tv program in the regular set and possible others in stretch-goal cards. I chose these characters to balance out future KILLER DUDES editions. There are many killer dudes, I will be doing more editions eventually. Something to look forward to!
PLEDGE LEVELS
Every pledge level will have 1 regular KILLER DUDES 2 card set and 1 Kickstarter title card. Pledge levels other than the 'Single Set' will have extra items (see image below). For example, the 'Take 2 Sets' will consist of; 1 KILLER DUDES 2 card set, 1 KS title card, and a set of your choosing. It can be another KILLER DUDES 2 set or one of the other sets. The 'choosing' will happen after the Kickstarter ends, funds are collected, and the survey is emailed out. In the survey, I will ask for your mailing address, your choices, and other FACE CARDS related questions.
ADD-ONS
The items below can be added on to your initial pledge. Increase your pledge by adding the item amount to your pledge level. If you have already pledged, there should be a button in the side bar that says "manage my pledge." For example, if you're in the U.S. and you pledge at the ALL 7 SETS ($60 + $14 shipping) level and you want to add-on an Additional Card Set ($10) for a friend, your total pledge will be $84. If that doesn't make sense, please message me for any specific combination questions.
The amounts below include shipping for that add-on item.
Add-on an extra KILLER DUDES 2 set or add-on sets that you missed. Be sure to mention A) Killer Dudes 2, B) Zombies, C) Vampires, D) Anti-Heroes, E) Creatures, F) Killer Dudes 1, or G) Killer Babes when the 'Survey' is emailed to you at the end of the Kickstarter.
As a special Kickstarter ONLY reward, the KILLER DUDES 2 set will be available as Metal Cards! Get them as a Pledge Level or as an Add-on. No where else will you be able to get this limited edition metal set.
There are only a few original 4"x6" drawings left from all 7 sets. Claim what remain before they're all gone. PLEASE MESSAGE ME DIRECTLY IF YOUR ADD-ON IS FOR ORIGINAL CARD ART. We don't want any one else trying to claim that item. Although most of the original art for this set has been claimed, there are a few from previous sets also available.
Available original art from KILLER DUDES 2
A - Dr. Phibes (unmasked)
F - Dr. Hannibal Lecter
G - Dr. Channard Cenobite
I - Max Jenke
Q - Captain Howdy
T - Leatherface
Y - Dr. Phibes (masked)
AA - Imotep (Egyptian)
STRETCH GOALS
Here are the Kickstarter EXCLUSIVES that I have planned to give to you at no additional cost. The more the campaign generates, the more free Stretch Goal items I can offer to every backer. Check out the updates for details. Let's see if we reach all of these stretch goals!
MANY THANKS!
Please tell a friend and share on social media to help us reach more stretch goals!
More editions of FACE CARDS are planned for the future. But, as I've done in the past, I've left the theme up to the backers in a form of a poll. Expect a new set every 9 months or so!
Check out the Facebook page The Art of Byron Winton to see more of my 4x6 drawings, many of which these cards are based on. Follow me on Instagram and Twitter. Lastly, join me on Patreon to support in the creative process and to sign-up for the popular Card-of-the-Month program.
Thank you for your interest and support!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
At the time of the launch, I have a few images left to complete for the set. I plan to have them done before the campaign ends. In doing so, the Available Original Art will reflect their completion.

I given myself enough printer time for an end of March delivery for all the regular set backers. However, in the event that I am unable to ship by March, I will update you with a revised shipping date.

For those of you getting the 4"x6" drawing rewards with your sets, please be patient during the creation of those. I will produce them as quickly as I can without disrupting my current work-load. Depending on the quantity will determine the complete turn around time. I will mail in weekly batches.

I will be adjusting quantities available if necessary. There are ONLY 500 sets being produced... and even less are available for the previous sets.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hey everybody!
As you can see below, the KILLER DUDES 2 cards are here! Surprisingly, the 26 boxes came sooner than expected. Yeah, as I feared when I mentioned in the last update, they did end up shipping in 26 boxes! After opening them all to inspect, I set-up a little assembly line of cards, stickers, and magnets to snap this pic. I am ready to collate!

updates.update_userinfo: My Killer Dudes, a Time to Rejoice!
updates.update_content: Hi there everyone! The country has been slowly opening in varying degrees in different cities. This has created some uncertainties when I have items produced all over the country. Nonetheless, through some patience and research, I am pleased to announce some immediate updates.

updates.update_userinfo: Stickers and the State of Things
updates.update_content: Hi there everyone! It's been 2 months under quarantine lock-down since my last update. I have some good news and I thought an update was in order.

Hi everyone! Since the last update a lot has happened in the world, as you are aware, due to the Coronavirus Pandemic. Everyone is in lock-down and businesses are closed.
I'm safe and continuing to work from home, making art for clients. I've been busy in that regard. However, my spring convention schedule is shot. I don't get to promote new art and network with new clients. This has greatly affected my income, but the government relief package should offset some of that.

Hey everyone!
After a bit of a delay, the surveys have finally been sent out. Thank you for being patient. I had to wait because an important part of the survey is the sticker selection question. I wanted to make sure that the characters you picked were exactly the art represented. Which meant that I had to complete all of the character art before sending the survey out.
The response to the surveys have been fantastic! Nearly 75% have been returned after two days! Thank you for your speedy response. The sticker question results are looking impressive so far and I'm seeing a few clear winners for 1st and 2nd. For the other two, it's a little tight. As soon as I get the remainder of the surveys, I can then place an order for the stickers.

In the past 24 hours you unlocked Stretch Goals 8 and 9! Two Final Girl Cards are unlocked! Laurie Strode and Kirsty Cotton. Hell yeah! That's how we push through!
All backers will be getting in addition to the basic set of FACE CARDS: KILLER DUDES Edition No. 2; 1 Kickstarter Title Card, 1 Title Card Magnet, a 4 Card Sticker Set, 5 Alternate Look Cards, and 2 Final Girl Cards! The stickers will be determined by participating backer votes after the Kickstarter ends.

campaign.story:
OLD MAN LIKE RON Trading Card Series
Some months back, a friend of mine showed me a short video on Facebook ... the video was titled 'Bubbles'. It featured a loud-mouthed, swearing, old man 'puppet' named Ron yelling and swearing about putting bubbles in his bathwater. It had me laughing so hard I instantly thought it would make a HILARIOUS trading card series. But to my knowledge, no one had ever published a trading card series based on short 2-3 minute videos posted on Facebook ... and certainly no card series with so much foul language. So that right there was reason enough to take this project on. Nick, the creator of Old Man Like Ron, was easy to chat with and we hammered out a deal to get these videos brought to the world of trading cards. And here the project is! Right now!
If you've never heard of Old Man Like Ron ... you are MISSING OUT! Head on over to Facebook or Youtube, type in 'OLD MAN LIKE RON' and watch the videos. There are DOZENS of 1-4 minute videos of the absurd, offensive and ludicrous adventures of 'Ron'... everything from taking a bubble bath to having explosive POO after eating curry to being gobsmacked over large boobies on the television. 
 https://www.facebook.com/OldManLikeRon/ 
This trading card series features 24 of the first videos of the Old Man Like Ron series. Each trading card shows a scene from the video on the front ... and on the back the totally uncensored exact dialogue from that video (censored here on the Kickstarter ... but this card series is rated 'MA' because of language and 'adult' ... even if totally immature ... subject matter). To make these sets postpaid for everyone in the world I'm publishing TWO versions: a 'UK' version of 24 cards in 6 4-card panels (so the set can be mailed cheaper than a parcel, meaning I can mail it postpaid and low priced instead of charging $13 postage) ... and a 'US' version of 24 standard size cards. BOTH versions are otherwise identical with all 24 cards represented in each set.  
 Each set comes in it's own specific full color wrapper with checklist printed on the inside.   
MOTION LENTICULAR CARD:
Each set comes with a motion lenticular trading card showing an animated sequence of when Ron drops a can of pasta that's tied to his twig and berries.   
SKETCH CARDS by some of the Trading Card Hobby's Biggest Names!
Check out these artist names! There's Adam Everett Beck, Amanda Pattison, Bekki Sharp (the artist who showed me the first 'Ron' video I'd ever seen), Cyrus Sherkat, Dan Tearle, Dave Gaskin, David Day, Floydman, Ingrid Hardy, J. Hammond, Jaime Hitchcock, James Dickson, Jamie Cosley, Junior Bruce, Kevin P. West, Lee Dumarquez, Junior Bruce, Leon Braojos, Lindsey Greyling, Mai Irving, Marsha Parkins, Matthew Hirons, Matthew Stewart, Michael Mastermaker, Quinton Baker, Rees Finlay, Rich Molinelli, Scott Harrell ... and there are also some other artists working on 'Ron' art cards who haven't yet gotten in their work (but are working on it). Because of the wonderful flexibility of the project artists were allowed to GO CRAZY with their art cards and provide some of the most hilarious sketch cards you'll ever see. I'll post examples below.   
 Limited Edition, Numbered Metal Card ... KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE! Will be available only here and now during the Kickstarter.
There will be a limited edition numbered metal card created for master set level backers, limited to the number of backers/pre-orders during this 30-day campaign. The metal card will be published by those great people Jacob and Julie at FAERIE METAL! A limited edition metal card will be given to EVERY backer who pledges at the master set level or above. IMAGE ... well, THAT'S a SURPRISE! :-) 
"SO! Just HOW do I add this FUCKING BRILLIANT card series to MY collection?" Well, here are the pledge levels and the fun stuff you get with that pledge:
$2: At the $2 level you get ONE of the promo cards banned by Non Sport Update Magazine (meaning this promo card is RARE!). And it is postpaid anywhere in the world.
$12: Complete UK Version Set. For $12 you get the complete set of all 24 trading cards in 6 perforated panels all housed in the UK version wrapper. PLUS you get the LENTICULAR MOTION card PLUS the promo card! ALL postpaid anywhere in the world!
$12: Complete US Version Set. For $12 you get the complete set of all 24 trading cards all housed in the US version wrapper. PLUS you get the LENTICULAR MOTION card PLUS the Promo card! All postpaid anywhere in the world. 
$20: At this level you get ONE of the complete UK version card sets PLUS ONE of the complete US version card sets (each with a lenticular motion card of course). PLUS a promo card. Postpaid in the US.
$36: THE MASTER SET LEVEL!  At this level you get the UK complete set, the US complete set (all in their own wrappers) PLUS a lenticular motion card, ALL promo cards to be published for this card series PLUS a genuine original art sketch card, PLUS both the US and the UK version wrappers in unused/unfolded condition. Postpaid in the US.
$62: DOUBLE the FUN! At the $62 level you get DOUBLE everything in the master set level. TWO of the UK sets, TWO of the US sets, TWO lenticular motion cards, TWO of all promo cards to be published for this card series AND two unused wrappers for EACH of the two series (US and UK) ...  PLUS  TWO original art sketch cards (each sketch card will be a different artist). Postpaid in the US.
$95: TRIPLE PLUS!  At the $85 level you get THREE master sets of everything (THREE times the $36 master set level) but instead of THREE sketch cards you get FOUR original art sketch cards (each one by a different artist). The ideal level for those who want to have a master set PLUS 4 original art sketch cards ... and also extra sets to give as gifts to your friends and family who aren't easily offended by foul-mouthed humor. 
This Kickstarter will run until December 25th ... and it ends at 8pm PST on CHRISTMAS NIGHT! 

Questions  and Answers:
Q:  I want to get stuff, but I don't want to sign up to back on Kickstarter. How do  I go about it?
A:  Some collectors and fans don't want to sign up on Kickstarter. If you are unable  to back through this Kickstarter just message me. We'll work it out, no  worries.
---------------
Q:  When will the "Old Man Like Ron" Trading Card Series ship?
A:  The 24-card UK and US version sets, wrappers, lenticulars AND sketch cards are ALL DONE, HERE, RIGHT NOW! I have just a couple special promo cards to have produced yet and plan on doing that next week. So what does this mean? What it means is that on December 25th this Kickstarter ends ... about 10 days later Kickstarter funds everyone's pledges ... and once everything is funded I will ship. So basically, 10 days after this Kickstarter ends I'll be shipping out packages. Just be sure to provide your mailing address after the Kickstarter is over (no worries, I send out mailing address surveys after a Kickstarter finishes). 
---------------------
Q:  I'm OCD and want a pack to keep sealed and a pack to open. How do I back on two packs? Or two 'Master Sets'?
A:  There's already a level for pledging on multiple master sets. Now, if you wanted a master set and 2 regular sets ... or a master set and an extra UK pack set, that's easy -- just pledge on the pledge level that is CLOSE to what you want and then message me and i'll walk you through how to adjust your pledge so you get everything you want.  
----------------- ADD ON GOODIES:
If you want something not listed ... or a different combination ... or just whatever customized pledge level you had in mind ... just let me know and if it's possible we'll do it.  And of course if you have any questions just ask! My goal is to make sure you have fun with your collection and it's everything you want it to be.
-----------------------
If  you have a question not answered here please just ask -- you can message me  directly through Kickstarter and I will respond as quickly as possible. It is  better to message me than to post a comment. Kickstarter shows me MESSAGES as  soon as they are posted but is not consistent with showing me 'comments' (plus Kickstarter will show me someone has commented ... but they don't show me where the comment is -- if it is a comment on an update please note there are 100s of updates spread over 20 different Kickstarters ... meaning a 'comment' is a needle in the haystack. If you want me to see your comment, question, etc. send it as a MESSAGE).  If you can't figure out how to  message on Kickstarter then just contact me through my RRParksCARDS.com website.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Risks and challenges Risks? Well I suppose an asteroid could come hurtling through space and land on my head. Otherwise, this is my 24th Kickstarter Campaign... and I've published dozens of other card series over the last 6 years (including eight different Three Stooges series, Gary Saves the Graveyard, two Basil Wolverton series, Japanese Horror in 3D, am currently finishing up Mystery Science Theater 3000 Series Three and others). I know my way around card publishing and financing production. And for this project, the cards and wrappers and lenticular motion card AND the sketch cards are actually IN HAND right now! The only thing left to do is to produce the couple few promo cards I have in mind. Otherwise, everything is produced and waiting here! Please note: AFTER this Kickstarter ends and right before I start shipping I'm going to send out what's called a 'mailing address survey' email through Kickstarter (everyone will automatically get a survey and Kickstarter will alert you when it is available PLUS I will post updates letting everyone know ... be sure to fill that out and message it back to me when the time comes so there's no delays in mailing your package. Okay? Okay!).
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Good EeeEeEvening.... And WELCOME to our SIXTH annual HALLOWEEN TRADING CARD EVENT!
HAPPY HALLOWEEN from RRParks CARDS! We're wrapping up our sixth year as a trading card company as well as our sixth Halloween as a publisher. Every October we publish some fun spoooooky and creepy horror and monster card sets.  This Halloween is no different except that we have added a selection of truly bizarre 'baseball' and 'sports' cards to the lineup ... but not your typical sports cards (because that wouldn't be weird enough!).  Your pledge on this project helps with production costs and will make sure you get ALL the CARD SERIES as well as exclusives.
Unlike last year I'm going into this Kickstarter with the plan of mailing all Halloween packages in time for Halloween (last year just got too hectic). Some of the cards of this Halloween have already been printed and here already... others have just been sent to printing ... and some I have to have produced when the Kickstarter ends (such as the limited edition ETCHING and METAL cards which have production numbers determined by the number of backers ... making such cards VERY rare and NEVER to be reprinted). AND, of course, I've already started assembling the traditional RRParksCARDS Halloween 'trick or treat' goodie bags for backers that will accompany most pledge levels.
So, what card series are happening this year?
Halloween Trick or Treat Series SEVEN!
Halloween Trick or Treat Series Seven features 12 different SPOOOOOKY vintage Halloween masterpieces (24 wonderful images) on glossy cards with black borders. All housed in a wrapper.
 Monster Choke 'n Gag Series Five 
Continuing the Monster Choke 'n Gag series -- which was the first card series I published under my then-new company RRParks CARDS -- comes series five. 29 different 1960s style midgee and triplix panel cards. This time the focus is on Attack of the Giant Leeches (featured on an episode of Mystery Science Theater 3000) with 57 'riffed scenes' including a checklist back card. All in their own wrapper with bonus cards.
Quatermass and the Pit
Perhaps you've never heard of Quatermas and the Pit... but you HAVE heard of the movie FIVE MILLION YEARS TO EARTH. Well, almost 10 years before that classic Hammer film was released, the BBC did a 6-hour, 6-part miniseries called Quatermass and the Pit. It is one of my all time favorite science fiction / horror movies and I'm continuing the series started last year ... this is series two and features the 2nd episode of the BBC production. When construction workers begin work on a new housing development they discover strange fossil skulls ... a paleontologist gets wind of the find and with the assistance of Professor Quatermass and the professor's nemesis, Colonel Breen, the 3 set out to investigate the strange fossils in the pit. And it is quickly determined that they, and the strange cylinder found with them, are not what they seem. Stay tuned -- Halloween 2020 will have Quatermass and the Pit series three!
1960s style NASA 3D Tribute Card ... PLUS pair of 3D glasses!
Paying tribute to NASA seemed fitting this year which marked the anniversary of the Apollo moon landing. So I commissioned Christian LeBlanc (anaglyph 3D maestro of MST3K Series 1, 2, and 3 as well as Sharknado Series 1 and 'The 100th Anniversary of Zorro') to do a special 3D back of one of my favorite astronauts (or 'astrochimp'). It is being created 'retro-stalgic style' to capture some of the feel of a 1960s card.
Prehistoric Perils of Golf -- the classic 1920s cards NO ONE can ever find or afford!
An exceedingly rare sport/non-sport set of the 1920s is 'Perils of Golf'. Unless you have MANY $$$'s, this card series is just out of reach of most collectors. As the original series was produced blank on the back I've taken that space and designed in the equally classic, rare and pricey 'Tobin Lithograph Baseball' set from 1887 showing comical baseball players of the late 19th century. These are being published 'retro-stalgic' style, too!
1882 H804-11 Cosack and Company 'Circled Position' complete set of NINE!
Not quite as 'weird' as some 19th century sports sets, this one is more ... PRE-MAINSTREAM 'classic' and a truly beautiful early baseball set that ... like other 19th century baseball sets ... is ludicrously expensive when it can be found. But here's an affordable, retro-style complete set of all 9 (with vintage advertising on the backs). Even if one isn't a sports card collector the eye appeal of this set of cards is still likely to be of interest. 
The 1880s H804-15A 'Red Line' Baseball set (with 1880 'Baby Talk' baseball on reverse).
If I were ever to collect 19th century sports cards, THESE would be the two sets I started out with. But because I'm not filthy, stinky rich (as Zoidberg would say "Two out of three just doesn't cut it!") I haven't, can't and most likely won't. But since I want them in my collection I'm making it possible for EVERYONE to afford this set. And here they are ... all 10 of them! The red border series on the front and 'Baby Talk' on the back. Retro-style printed? But of COURSE they are!
The 1878 and 1880 FORBES 'Comic Baseball' and 'Baseball Injuries' 6-card set!
Another classic series of the golden (or platinum?) age of baseball cards ... 'comic' and 'injuries'. Produced retro-stalgic style this complete 6 card set features 'comics' on the front and 'injuries' on the back.
Kickstarter Exclusive 'Master Set' Level Metal Cards
For Master Set backers we've got not ONE but TWO Kickstarter Exclusive DEMONIC metal cards. One features a devilish creature surrounded by witches  ...and the other my own interpretation of 'GOLEM' etching I created in the 1990s during my brief career as a comic book artist for a comic book called 'Demon Child' ... the etching was done as a promotional piece for the comic book and I sold the etchings at comic book conventions. And here's the artwork for it produced on quality metal by those fine folks at Faerie Metal -- Jacob and Julie Stem. These metal cards will be limited to ONLY the number of Master Set backers (plus a set for myself of course) and will never be reprinted. 
THREE Genuine HAND PULLED Horror Etching cards by RRParks
Back in the 1990s I used to do copper plate etching ... a fun art method involving nitric acid, ammonia, spirits and thinners, resin, carnuba wax lit tapers, soot and other fun and lethal chemicals. Here are 3 different works I'm replating as trading card size: 'Bog Head', 'Final Sniff' and 'Frankenstein's Monster'. These, like the metal cards, will be limited to ONLY the number of Master Backers who pledge on that level and backs will have signed and numbered certificates of authenticity. Backers are NOT limited to only one master set ... but when this Kickstarter ends, ONLY those who pledged on the Master Set will ever get a set of these. My 'plan' this year is to actually take photos of the etching process ... and post the photos as an update when I start creating the cards. 
GENUINE PRINTING PLATES
As has become tradition over here, my annual Halloween card series Kickstarters include at least ONE genuine printing plate for Master Set backers. MOST of the cards this year will be produced and ordered to include printing plates for each card. And you GET ONE with your pledge! Each will have a certificate of authenticity on the back.
RARE and EXCLUSIVE PROMO CARDS available nowhere else!
I don't have a photo to show you yet, but as Kickstarter backers on my Halloween campaigns already know, I produce exclusive promo cards for the annual event. Some are destined to be sent to The Wrapper and given our sparingly to resubscribers of that magazine ... while other promos will be available ONLY HERE and ONLY NOW! Planned are 4 'Wrapper' promos and about 5 other promo cards destined ONLY for Kickstarter backers. So if you like promo cards ... and LOVE really rare promo cards, then you'll want them all and you'll get them all at the Master Set level.
BONUS STUFF!
Those pledging on the MASTER SET will get BONUS GOODIES including a printing plate, progressive proof, error card and bonus cards. PLUS, of course, the usual little 'goodie bag' with some Halloween tricks and treats inside (See? You CAN be over 30 and still get a little treat bag for Halloween!).
CREEPY CELL CARDS!
For Master Pledge levels backers will get a Grim Reaper cell card and a Halloween Trick or Treat cell card.  I started the annual RRParksCARDS Halloween cell cards last year ... and this year I continue with them.
Pledge Levels:
$3. For $3 you get ONE of the rare Wrapper promo cards and my thanks for supporting this Halloween Kickstarter.
BASIC SETS PLEDGE: At $30 you get ONE of each of the 2019's sets including Halloween Trick or Treat Series 7, Monster Choke 'n Gag Series 6, Quatermass and the Pit Series 2 -- all of which come in their own wrapper 'pack set'. You also get the NASA 3D tribute card with a free pair of 3D glasses. You also get the OTHER 4 sets: Prehistoric Perils of Golf 6-card set, Circle Position Baseball 9-card set, 'Red Line' 10 card set, and the 'Forbes' 6-card baseball set. You also get one of The Wrapper promo cards and a Trick or Treat 'goodie bag'. 
DELUXE BASIC PLEDGE: At $48 you get ALL the sets listed in the BASIC SETS level ... plus all 4 The Wrapper promo cards, Trick or Treat 'goodie bag' PLUS you get ONE genuine printing plate AND ONE random metal card (our choice) PLUS some bonus cards!
MASTER LEVEL: Here it is... the 'everything' level! At $75 you get ONE of each of all the different sets: Halloween Trick or Treat Series 7, Monster Choke 'n Gag Series 6, Quatermass and the Pit Series 2 -- all of which come in their own wrapper 'pack set'. You also get the NASA 3D tribute card with a free pair of 3D glasses. You also get the OTHER 4 sets: Prehistoric Perils of Golf 6-card set, Circle Position Baseball 9-card set, 'Red Line' 10 card set, and the 'Forbes' 6-card baseball set. PLUS every single promo card (the 4 The Wrapper promos PLUS the other 5 ... or more... exclsuive promos) ... PLUS you get BOTH of the limited edition metal cards ... PLUS you get all 3 different Genuine Etching Cards ... PLUS you get at least TWO genuine printing plates. PLUS a special production 'mystery monster' PANEL set (which you'll like... I guarantee it). PLUS the 'Trick or Treat' goodies bag so you can feel like you went trick or treating to a couple houses AND some extra goodies. PLUS the bonus CELL CARDS!
... and the next is THE ULTIMATE 'catch up' level:
The $250 ULTIMATE PLEDGE LEVEL:  This last one is to get you caught up on all the RRParksCARDS annual series. This one includes everything in the master set listed above. PLUS: Monster Choke 'n Gag series 1, 2, 3, 4, and 5 ... Halloween Trick or Treat series 1, 2, 3, 4,5  and 6 ... Scary Clowns series 1, Quatermass and the Pit series 1, The Dungeon of Doctor Dreck series 1 and 2 (plus the mini sets of House on Haunted Hill and Attack of the Giant Leeches) ... plus The Most Irritating Man in the World pack set with bonus 'toilet targets' PLUS Gary Saves the Graveyard deluxe set with zombie head and all 8 autograph cards (the director plus 7 main actors), PLUS a loose set of all 50 The Monster Times cards... PLUS bonus printing plates (yes, more than one), Glow in the Dark Cards, the super rare Dance of Death limited edition genuine etching card series (which has been selling on my website for $95/set and getting closer to being sold out) ... and MUCH more! Expect a wonderous package of goofy, ghoulish trading cards. This is the 'BIG ONE'. And expect some really cool bonus collectibles in this one (they're a surprise! All treats -- No tricks!).
If you don't see the exact pledge level you'd like to back just message me and we'll piece one together for you.
ADD ONS:
As I've posted before, because my production year is really 'jammed' and hectic, the ONLY TIME to get past Halloween sets is during the Halloween Kickstarter. If there are sets you missed and wanted, NOW is the time. Such sets include Halloween Trick or Treat series 1,2 , 3, 4, 5, and 6 ... Monster Choke 'n Gag series 1, 2, 3, 4 and 5 ... The Grim Reaper series 1, 2 and 3 ... Yoshitoshi Japanese Horror in 3D ... Dungeon of Doctor Dreck series 1 and 2 ... The Three Stooges 'Halloween Stooge-tacular Box ... The Monster Times ... and so on. You can also add on for Basil Wolverton Barflize or Basil Wolverton 2: Wolverton's Women ... Three Stooges (there were 8 series, most probably still available ... but some are REALLY close to sold out) ... MST3K Series 1 and 2 ... MIGHT be able to conjure up a Sharknado series 1 ... If you missed out on 'The 100th Anniversary of Zorro' regular box, just let me know. I do my best to work things out with everyone and the only time I can't is when something is completely sold out.  Message me about something you're seeking and if I still have it, you can 'add on' to your pledge at the original release price. 
Risks and challenges
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This is my 23rd Kickstarter ... Everything always gets produced -- between my experience, trusted artists, an outstanding printing production broker I've always come through on everything (and more often than not ON TIME, TOO!). And in the case of the Halloween sets above, virtually EVERYTHING is already printed/produced or already at the printers. By the time this Kickstarter ends only things that will remain to be produced are the Metal Cards and the Genuine Etching Cards and I will get right on those when I know how many backers there are at the Master and Deluxe Master levels (since they will be produced only to the quantities needed to fulfill such pledges).
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

PLUS bonus printing plates (yes, more than one), Glow in the Dark Cards, the super rare Dance of Death limited edition genuine etching card series (which has been selling on my website for $95/set and getting closer to being sold out) ... and MUCH more! The SCARY BIG PACKAGE!
