campaign.story:
The Three Stooges Theater Trading Card Series -- I'm very excited about being able to finally publish this card series. It is BEAUTIFUL -- collecting over 240 lobby cards and one sheet graphics all into one place for both Three Stooges fans  and card collectors to enjoy.  
Background Story on the Creation of this Card Series
Vintage Lobby Cards, One Sheets and Poster Art
 A perfect case of being in the right place at the right time. In 2014 I'd gotten the licensing agreement to publish Chronicles of The Three Stooges Trading Cards. A Stooge and trading card collector's dream come true for me. I was provided access to some 2,200+ hi res archive images of The Three Stooges (but no lobby cards or one sheets) ... I then built myself a small library of Three Stooges reference books and materials ... and the licensing company was enthusiastic, encouraging and extremely helpful in assisting me putting together the largest Three Stooges card series ever (and with already six trading card series and some 1,200 different cards perhaps one of the largest non-sport series of all time). Just about the time I got the license and began pre-production of Chronicles of The Three Stooges Series One the major auction house Robert Edwards Auctions began handling the largest Three Stooges lobby card and one sheet collection... I can't recall how I got wind of it but I did and at EXACTLY the right time, right before they sold and shipped the items to buyers (after that they obviously couldn't take high res photos). I contacted them. And I worked out a deal at the last second to have them take high resolution TIFF format images of the entire collection. ALL of them. Over 240 different images. Cost me a pretty penny (well... more like a quarter million pennies). I wasn't sure if I would be able to have time or authorization to publish the card series because Chronicles of The Three Stooges was pretty darn MASSIVE for this newbie publisher to tackle in the three short years I had to publish. And so I set the TIFF files aside -- I was willing to take the chance because such a collection would never again be all in one place at the same time in order to photograph them all. But after Chronicles of The Three Stooges Series Five was finished the licensing company granted me an additional year on my contract. YAY! That meant two things -- firstly, I had enough time to publish the SIXTH trading card entry (The '1959 Three Stooges Reprint' card series) AND also just enough time before my revised contract expired to create SEVENTH series:  'The Three Stooges Theater' series. Which I've done. Which is ready to go to press. Which is why I'm running this Kickstarter. With this seventh series I will have covered (I believe) every single aspect of The Three Stooges from 1930 to 1959 and even the 1960s. I honestly can't think of a thing I haven't covered (and I've had a lot of emails and phone calls with fellow fans trying to figure out if anything was left out) -- and so this seventh Three Stooges series is the grand finale to one of the funnest projects I've ever worked on.
The Three Stooges Theater Trading Card Series
Enough back story. Onto the card series details. This series is currently designed to include 106 different base cards featuring the lobby cards and one sheet poster art from 1934 through 1959 -- the cards are being printed on high gloss quality 16pt UV stock with high end offset printing with the lobby card cards featuring a full card view on the front of one with two lobby cards presented on the backs of the cards... and for the other cards, a full-card image of a one-sheet poster on each side of the card. This seventh series also includes 16 'retro stalgic' style cards (like the 1959 continuation cards from Chronicles of The Three Stooges Series 2, 3, 4 and 5 and the '1959 Three Stooges Reissue Series') each featuring a lobby card on the front and on the back of the card, 4 new 'Faux Scratch n Sniff' Stooges cards, 20 different tobacco style card panels with -- you guessed it -- classic lobby cards ...  plus beautiful silver metal box toppers AND 5 gold metal and 4 white metal Kickstarter exclusive cards. Might even be a few additional surprises.
Tobacco Style Cards
The Three Stooges Theater Trading Card Series is being issued in a retail style pack box -- with 24 10-card packs. A box is guaranteed to contain a complete base set, complete retro stalgic continuation subset, complete set of Faux Scratch n Sniff Stooge cards. Each box will also contain 1 of 9 different silver metal box toppers (don't worry -- there's a master set pledge level in this kickstarter so you can get it all). The box is designed to have mini clipout cards like Chronicles of The Three Stooges Series 1, 2, 3, 4 and 5.
The Wrapper Design
Publishing Timeframe
The going plan is to publish around the end of April and release the product late May or early June. Let's call it 'June' for the moment. If you've backed my previous Three Stooges Kickstarters you already know that I issue product almost ALWAYS on time (usually early... and only once with a 2 week delay from planned release date). And I'll naturally post updates regularly to keep everyone informed regarding production and assembly and shipping. 
The Three Stooges Theater Trading Card Series Kickstarter Exclusives
GOLD METAL EXCLUSIVES
  White Metal Exclusives
The GOLD and WHITE METAL Exclusives will be limited edition releases and available ONLY to Kickstarter backers. They will be limited to the number of backers online, phone-in and snail mailed during the Kickstarter. So I'll know how many sets to have the fine folks at Faerie Metal produce once this kickstarter is over. I'll post this information as an update as the campaign goes forward. These GOLD and WHITE METAL cards feature 5 of the most beautiful and iconic of the poster art of the 1930s-1950s as well as my all-time favorite lobby card set "Whoops! I'm an Indian". Each of the GOLD and WHITE METAL cards will have a signed and numbered certificate of authenticity on the back (similar to the 1959 Commemorative metal set in my last Kickstarter). 
Silver Metal Box Toppers
9 DIFFERENT SILVER METAL BOX TOPPERS
 The SILVER METAL box toppers will be issued at the rate of ONE per box with 9 different total to collect. Each SILVER METAL box topper will have a signed certificate of authenticity on the back. These feature the classic and iconic 'credit cards' from the Columbia shorts -- Curly era, Shemp era and Besser era graphics as well as title cards from Woman Haters (the first Three Stooges Columbia short), Punch Drunks, Men in Black (nominated for an Academy Award), Pardon my Scotch, Three Little Beers and Hold That Lion (Curly's last appearance in a Stooge short and the only Three Stooges Short with all 3 Howard brothers in the same short). These are being produced by Faerie Metal so you already know, I'm sure, that means BEAUTIFUL metal cards!
 PLEDGE LEVELS
I'm setting up this campaign with levels to satisfy (hopefully) all collector levels and budgets and I want long-time backers to see this as not just a fun series but also the BEST PRICED 'grand finale' to a 4-year long endeavor to create The Three Stooges trading card series that always should have been. 
$4 PLEDGE. This gets you the two basic promo cards, promo card #1 and promo card #2.  
$20 PLEDGE. This gets you 5 10-card packs plus promo cards #1 and #2. 
$50 PLEDGE. This gets you a full complete BOX of 24 10-card packs and ONE (of 9) SILVER METAL box toppers. As mentioned above, a 24-pack box is guaranteed to contain a complete base set, complete 'retro stalgic' continuation subset, complete 4-card 'Faux Scratch n Sniff' insert set and one box topper SILVER METAL card. I'm also planning to include at least ONE genuine printing plate 'chase' card per box featuring an authentic 1 of 1 printing plate from Chronicles of The Three Stooges. Plus the 2 different promo cards. After the Kickstarter is ended boxes will be repriced to $75/box (so this is everyone's chance to have an early bird special price on a full box).
$100 MASTER SET LEVEL PLEDGE. This gets you everything from the $50 pledge level PLUS you'll get all 9 different SILVER METAL box toppers, all 5 different GOLD METAL exclusives and all 4 WHITE METAL "Whoops! I'm an Indian" cards. Plus all promo cards that are published for the card series. GOLD and WHITE METAL limited edition cards will ONLY be available during the kickstarter. 
$350 DEALER LOT PLEDGE. Since this series is being issued in retail boxes (as opposed to a factory set style release) with packs being barcoded for individual sale by dealers I've created this option for dealers who want to sell packs in their store... or 'case breakers' who want to open packs and build sets... or simply those collectors who want a LOT of packs to open and enjoy building sets for their collection. This level will get you EIGHT boxes, each with a different SILVER METAL box topper... and I'll include the 9th SILVER METAL box topper as a bonus. So you'll get EIGHT boxes and guaranteed complete set of all 9 different SILVER METAL cards (plus one printing plate per box... you already know what RRParks CARDS printing plates sell for on ebay... the plates alone would cover your entire cost of this pledge level). Am sure I'll also be including error cards and other bonus items.
ADD ON LEVELS: For those who are just now discovering RRParks CARDS Three Stooges card series these following levels are designed to 'catch you up' with the series. This way you can back the 'The Three Stooges Theater' series (above) and then ADD ON a level that includes all previous card series. If you have any questions just message me -- I realize there is a lot of data in this Kickstarter so let me know if something isn't clear and we'll get through it! 
$350 "I WAS ASLEEP" pledge level. This level is to help late comers 'catch up'. It includes Chronicles of The Three Stooges Series 1, 2, 3, 4 and 5 PLUS the 1959 Three Stooges Reissue box. If you're only just now finding out about the Three Stooges trading cards here's your chance to catch up. Series 1, 2 and 3 were all pack-style retail box releases and guaranteed to contain complete base sets. Series 4 and 5 were factory set releases each containing complete sets (with Series 4 being perhaps the LARGEST single non-sport card series ever published in a box). You get it all ... base sets, subsets, foil box toppers, Christmas foils, candid foils, all the retro-stalgic continuation card subsets, all the 3D Stooge cards, all the Glow in the Darks, Film Cell Relic cards, 1960s style pack sets, tobacco card panels, and more. The 1959 Reissue box even includes a full color metal portrait card. 
$400 "I WAS ASLEEP" DELUXE. You get everything listed in the "I WAS ASLEEP" pledge level PLUS a complete set of ALL promo cards for ALL series. Plus an extra printing plate from Chronicles of The Three Stooges. PLUS the expanded collectors kit (which includes about 60 collector kit exclusive cards, binder cover inserts for 'Chronicles' AND for '1959 Reissue' series, Chronicles 'title' header cards, uncut gilded (gold) foil panel of Larry, Moe and Curly PLUS uncut foil 'manga style' Larry, Moe, Curly and Shemp. Considering modern trading card series and how hard they are to complete this is the HOLY GRAIL of non-sport card deals. 
$750 "I WAS SLEEP TWICE AS LONG". With this pledge you get everything in the $400 pledge level... except TWICE. Double everything. One collection for YOU and one collection to squirrel away... break up and sell on ebay or shows... give as a present to someone (which is likely more than they deserve, you're such a good friend!).
CUSTOMIZED PLEDGE LEVELS. If you don't see a pledge level that suits your needs just let me know. I've done customized pledge levels before -- it's no bother. Be advised, requesting a customized pledge level is NOT for 'haggling' over pledge level prices -- the prices listed above are what they are (and if you've ever published trading cards you can already see they are very low). A customized pledge level can be created for those seeking a bulk deal... or if someone has Chronicles series 1 and 3 and the 1959 and wants a level that includes 2 and 4 and the 'Theater' set. Or for collectors seeking certain printing plate package deals, uncut sheets and so on. I'll do what I can (within reason) to accommodate special requests. You get the idea... this is to fine tune a package that covers everything you want, need or gotta have or you'll die.
 I'll post updates during and after the Kickstarter campaign letting everyone know progress and production 'milestones' and finally 'shipping date' once production is done and 'backer swag' is packaged up and ready for mailing. Printing production of this series is planned to take place around the end of April and last minute design changes may occur depending on licensing.  Questions? Please just message me.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
RISKS: This Kickstarter campaign marks my 10th Kickstarter ... perhaps 11th. And my 23rd trading card series. All of my prvious Kickstarters were successfully funded and products issued on time ... or within about a week or two of scheduled release date. The Three Stooges Theater Card Series is designed, formatted, concept approved through licensing and in the final stages of fine tuning. My print broker, the amazing Karen Cowan of ICONIX is lining up the printing companies involved (ALL of which we've worked with before) ... I've sent in prototypes to Faerie Metal for the metal cards ... packaging and wrappers are designed. Everything is ready to launch and publish. And once this Kickstarter has ended and funded I'll be going right to production. The release date is tentatively set for late May or June. I foresee no problems. So the risks involve asteroids crashing to earth around the vicinity of Carson City Nevada... catastrophic earthquakes... or alien invasion. Otherwise, as with the previous 10 or 11 Kickstarters everything gets published on time and everyone gets what they pledged on ... I'm no stranger to publishing, production, time frames, product assembly and shipping. If you've backed my projects in the past you already know that I post many updates to keep everyone informed of production, progress and release date changes [and sometimes even BONUS stuff being added to the 'swag' packages] ... and I answer all questions within 24 hours (whenever possible). Note, packaging and cards may have some design changes (no changes are currently planned, but sometimes last minute legal notice or template changes are needed for production and logistics. The box in the above photos as the design right now and while the final box will be retro style there may, or may not, be slight changes for logistical reasons). If you have any questions or if something is unclear by all means message me -- with your help and support we can make this historical trading card series possible and the BEST it can possibly be. Thanks much, Richard Parks [RRParksCARDS]
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
It's the 3rd set in the series!
If you're familiar with my previous FACE CARDS Kickstarter campaigns; KILLER BABES and KILLER DUDES then you should know the quality and passion that I put into each trading card set. For those who are coming into this new, let me tell what you'll expect...
My main objective with each Kickstarter campaign is to raise funds for the printing costs and cover shipping and Kickstarter fees. The majority of the cards have been created and are ready for the press. I just need a little financial help to get the ball rolling.
By supporting you'll get the basic CREATURES set PLUS EXCLUSIVE material (rewards) only offered here as a Kickstarter backer!
I'm looking to have the basic sets printed, packaged, and ready for my 2017 convention season beginning in March. Time is limited here. Again, I've opted for a 21 day fundraising run. Please share this with a friend who might also be interested in this novelty item.
Click to view ALL of the CREATURE cards
ABOUT THE CARDS
Each basic 25 card set has 1 title card and 24 b&w creature portrait cards.
Every backer will also receive 1 limited 'Kickstarter Funded' title card.
Every card has a detailed portrait on the front and specs on the back. The specs include; the character's name, the creator's name, the movie they were in, the director, the synopsis of the film, trivia, and the film poster.
The sets does not contain any nudity and is considered "safe for work."
Each set will be signed and numbered. Only 500 sets will be produced.
Each set will be in its own crystal clear 25 card count box.
 ADD-ONS
The items below can be added on. Increase your pledge by adding the amount below to your core pledge level. If you have already pledged, there should be a button in the side bar that says "manage my pledge." For example, if you pledge at the SINGLE SET ($10 + $4 shipping) level and you want to add-on another set, you pledge a total amount of $25. 
The amounts below include shipping for that add-on item. 
Add-On an extra set. Or sets that you missed. Be sure to mention A) Creatures, B) Killer Dudes, or C) Killer Babes.
As a special Kickstarter ONLY reward, the Creatures set (including the KS funded card) will be available as Metal Cards! Get it as a reward tier or as an Add-On. No where else will you be able to get this limited feature.
Add-On a collage print of the sets. Select from A) Creatures, B) Killer Dudes, or C) Killer Babes.
All 24 Character Cards of Each Set Used in the Prints
There's only a few original drawings left from all 3 sets. Claim what's left before they're all taken. PLEASE MESSAGE ME IF YOUR ADD-ON IS FOR THE ORIGINAL CARD ART. We don't want anyone else claiming that item.
Available 4x6 Drawings Used For the Sets
 STRETCH GOALS
Here are a couple Kickstarter EXCLUSIVES that I have planned. More details will become available as we get closer to the target goal. Let's see if we reach these stretch goals!
 MANY THANKS!
Please tell a friend and share on social media!
More editions of FACE CARDS are planned and here are 2 sets I have in mind; Damned Kids and Zombies. Expect a new set every 5-6 months! Stay tuned!
Check out the Facebook page The Art of Byron Winton to see more of my 4x6 drawings. Follow me on Instagram and Twitter. Lastly, join me on Patreon if you're looking to support in the creative process. 
Thank you for your interest and support!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
I given myself enough printer time for an end of March delivery for all the backers. However, in the event that I am unable to ship in or by March, I will inform with a shipping update.

For those of you getting the 4"x6" drawing rewards with your sets, please be patient during the creation of those. I will produce them as quickly as I can without disrupting my current work-load. Depending on the quantity will determine the complete turn around time. I will mail in weekly batches.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: Updates and Other Bumps in the Night
updates.update_content:
Hey everyone! Thought I would briefly update with where this campaign is at and talk of things to come.
First of all, the majority of you should have gotten your card sets by now. Yay! Those who backed at the Original Art and Metal Sets, thank you for your patience. I have 2 drawings left to do for the original art. I will be sharing those with everyone in an update once they're completed. As for the Metal Sets, they're currently on their way back from the manufacturer! Yay, finally! They took longer than I would have expected. However, I'll have them in the mail as soon as I get them.
Second, I mentioned in a previous update about promoting a card-of-the-month feature through my Patreon page.

Hey everyone! The majority of you should have gotten your FACE CARDS: CREATURES in the mail by now... or soon will. The metal sets and the original art backed levels will go out as soon as that material is available. I've been getting some great feedback from some of you. Thanks!
I'm kicking around the idea of having a monthly FACE CARD that you can get by being a subscriber to my Patreon page. This won't interfere with future Kickstarter sets, but they also won't be a part of any set either. There have been some cool pieces that I've drawn that doesn't fit any of the themes I've put together or plan to do. So, this is an opportunity to get a random card... monthly! Plus, I figured this would be a great way to stimulate more interest in my Patreon page where I post a lot of the card art, other drawings, and progress pics of any painting that I'm working on. I'm thinking at the $3 tier... which would include shipping, a top-loader protector, and everything else offered at that tier. Current subscribers automatically will get them. Let me know what you think. I'd love to hear your thoughts or concerns.

I finally got everything together to ship the FACE CARDS: CREATURES out! It took a little longer with the sticker order this time around... not sure why... out of my control. Regardless, I will notify everyone when they are in the hands of the post office and relay tracking info for US backers. Those who backed the Metal Cards and Original Art have a little more longer to wait. I'll have those in the mail when they're available.
It's a great feeling to see this come together and wrapped up for the most part. I've begun planning the next set and will have details on that later.

Today (March 21) on Facebook at The Art of Byron Winton, 4PM EST, live Q&A video while I sign and collate my trading cards. Come join me if you can!
Sorry for the short notice. Sometimes you gotta act fast. I figured I would try this out for a bit... I might try to do more later on. We'll see.
- Byron

The CREATURES arrived at my doorstep from the printer today! Rawr! I need to sign, collate, and box a bunch while I wait for the rest of the items... mainly those stickers. THEN, I can start shipping everything out! So exciting!
- Byron

project_data.project_name: Face Cards: Creatures

campaign.story:
The Game
The Monster Game is a game in which you lie like the monster you are. You try to trick and deceive the other players until you kill their monsters. When you have the last monster alive, you win.
This game is all about deception and manipulation. After playing games where you have to follow the rules and be honest, I got bored. I wanted to lie. This game lets you do that. You can use any card in the game as long as the other players think that you have it in your hand. Easy, right? You would think so. If they call your bluff, your monster dies! However, if you were telling the truth, you get to live!
The Idea
I'm taking a game design class for college, and this is where the idea came from. I'm not sure how many people are taking their game seriously, but I for one wanted to create a game that others wanted to play. Throughout play testing, it was evident that others wanted to play this game, so I got some help from my friend Jake and together we fleshed it out into the game it currently is. Now we're here and I would love to see this game become something that is played outside of my own house.
Why Kickstarter?
There are two reasons that people go to Kickstarter for funding. One is money. Money is a big deal for things like this. The other is the people. I want to be able to connect with who buys my game. I can't go license this to a big game company while keeping the same level of communication that I can on Kickstarter. I like that I have reward tiers that let you suggest ideas for cards and even fully design cards! That is why I chose Kickstarter.
Why $16,000
That's a lot of money. Why do I need it all? Well, I want to create two versions of the game, a version to possibly sell in stores, then one exclusively for you guys, a Kickstarter edition that will never sell outside of this campaign. I need $11,000 do this. Between the Kickstarter fee and processing fees, I can expect about 7-10% of my funding to disappear, so I need say at least $12,225 so that after the fees I will have $11,000 that I need. The reason for that amount is that each game costs roughly $5000 for a printing run, leaving me with $1000 to deal with any hiccups in the manufacturing process. After this I need to increase the price, because shipping costs account for funding the project, but they will not be able to go towards the project, as I have to ship the games, meaning I can't spend that money. This is my first Kickstarter so I don't know any special tricks to bring the price down, but if I make more games in the future, I can bring this knowledge with me. The goal of this campaign will meet the bare minimum needed to make this game while also leaving a small sum of about $1,000 if there are extra fees in manufacturing.
In the Box
What's included in the box are the base game cards, which I will update with pictures when we have the art. The eight cards featured in the game are:
Hunter, Gorgon, Werewolf, Oracle, Vampire, Shapeshifter, Kraken, Cyclops
Any reward tier that includes the Kickstarter edition of the game will also include an undetermined extra cards (at least five) decided by us and backers, and potentially any special cards from the I AM BECOME MONSTER tiers. These cards will not be available in any sale of the game not from Kickstarter.
Stretch Goals
I am still talking with the production company about pricing for all the upgrades that I want to do, so I don't have a clear price yet. I will update this section when we meet the goals, when I have clear prices, and maybe even to add more goals!
Better Art!
     With this level of funding, I'll be able to pay artists instead of doing the art myself. While the current art isn't bad, it could be a lot better!
Better Instructions!
     As of right now, the instructions are a one page, front and back sheet of paper that doesn't look very nice. It effectively communicates the goal of the game and how to play, but at this level of funding I can upgrade the instruction booklet to be just that - a booklet!
Better Boxes!
     At this level of funding we could have way better boxes. Its something you don't really think about, but the game needs a nice home!
Better Quality
     Better quality says all needs to say. We can get nicer cards with every game and nicer 'resource' tiles. It will make for an all around nicer experience!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This is my first Kickstarter, but I have done research and I plan to do it justice.

After getting funded, the only foreseeable challenge is to make sure the rewards are printed and sent out on time.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
As of right now, we're still finalizing art. I will post some updates to the art publicly, but am going to mainly keep it private for the backers. The design of the cards will be staying the same, unless I am blown away by a new design. The only thing changing will be characters. For the past few months, I have just been using clipart, but during the campaign we can start upgrading the art to a more professional level. 
Thanks for reading!

campaign.story:
The “Open Your Eyes” book provides a KEY to achieving a historic success – introduction of a New Order of the World! 
 Dear all, with my project I would like to make you aware that a historical moment has come, when the Internet users from all around the world have a chance to make the first step towards creating a New Order of the World! It is the greatest project in the history of mankind! 
For many years now, a large part of the society present strong resistance to hearing the words “New World Order”. But it is we alone who can create such a “New Order of the World” as we deem appropriate. This is the noble goal I am encouraging you to pursue. It is not about the well known “New World Order” but about something completely different, which I have called a “New Order of the World”! In the fight against the introduction of the “New World Order” we will be assisted by supporting the plan of introduction of a “New Order of the World”! Each of you may contribute to introducing momentous changes in the history of mankind!
 I want to emphasise clearly that my main objective is to convince the society around the world so that they want to introduce the New Order of the World and publishing the book is essential to convince people to be willing to introduce historical changes. As regards the book that I have the honour to present, I have been working on it for about ten years (with brief pauses). The book is full of great, interesting NOVELTIES. Many ideas presented in it may soon indicate the direction for future human history!
At the moment, my main goals is for the book titled “Open Your Eyes” to reach the largest possible portion of society; afterwards, we will reach a completely different stage. (I assure you that everybody will have the guarantee of free choice. Everybody has a right to the freedom of thought and freedom of speech).
There is no doubts that initially, this book may cause a lot of controversy. However, very soon it will be the case that global society will see for itself that we are now faced exclusively with the truth and the most precious values cherished by all people.
 If there is anybody now who believes that I exaggerate in using the phrase “introducing the New Order of the World”, I would consciously like to declare that if the solutions I want to present in my book had been introduced before, there would be no person on earth who would claim that these changes are too insignificant for us to be talking about the New Order of the World. In some aspects, these will be great changes that humanity has never experienced before! It is also worth adding that if these changes had been effected in the world before, I don’t know whether we could find one person willing to return to the order observed nowadays – or previously, in any period of history. (At the same time, I want to assure you that every person searching for truth will probably agree with the ideas included in the book). Dear all, let us think about the future and support the most precious values of this world!
 The main topics of my book are “RELIGION” and “WARS”. To be more precise, in my book I mainly present: 
- A new, genuine Religion 
- A new, effective way to solve the problem of wars around the world
As regards the topic of RELIGION, the main reason why I wrote part of the book on this subject was that so far, we have never had a TRUE religion in the world. So far, people have made many significant errors as regards religion. The time has come to reach some wise conclusions. In my book, I have shown a new, true religion and I precisely described all its teachings, prayers, celebrations, symbols, names and evidence pointing to its authenticity, as well as considerations of various religious topics, etc., etc. Since this is the only TRUE religion that has ever appeared on earth, I hope that a large part of the global society will quickly want to become its followers. (I have also seen to it that the authenticity of this religion may be proved not only to the followers of other religions, but also atheists and agnostics). I would like to add that this religion is BRAND NEW, meaning that it is not an offshoot of any existing religion in the world, nor is it similar to any of the religions that have so far appeared. I have created this religion from SCRATCH. (I would like to emphasize that this religion is no “parody” or a “suspicious cult”, but a genuine religion). Let me mention one curious detail, namely, if one were to adopt a concept that “all the people on this planet will follow one and the same religion”, I am convinced that only the True Religion (which I have created) could prove to be the one. This is my opinion, because I believe that in order for the whole global society (or at least a large part of it) to be able to follow one and the same religion, one important condition would have to be fulfilled beforehand, namely: this religion would have to be fully based on TRUTH. (Unfortunately, so far no religion has manager to fulfil this condition). [Looking at some parts of the world, where religious divisions and conflicts are exacerbating, you will probably guess how many advantages there would be if there were a true religion in the world. (However, the main point and meaning of this religion rely in its TRUTH)].
[If anybody believes that “freedom of religion”, “getting rid of all the untruth” and „respecting the truth” in religion is a stupid idea, it’s enough to look at history again to see what trouble humanity had for this reason. (Also in the modern world, religious conflicts are numerous)].
I did realise that until people start to read my book, there is not the slightest chance e.g. „for atheists to stop wanting to be atheists”, „for agnostics to stop wanting to be agnostics”, and „the followers of other religions to stop wanting to follow them”. (A simple discussion will not change anything, but the chance becomes clear only after reading the book, which is ca. 2000 pages long and presents certain topics precisely). This means that initially, everybody will have negative attitude to religion and my other ideas. (However, I do hope many people will change their point of view after reading my book – this is also why I titled it „Open Your Eyes”). Today, I only want people to become familiar with my book. As regards their decisions, they will follow afterwards or whenever the people wish.
 On the other hand, the main reason why I wrote part of the book dedicated to WARS, was the fact that mankind has never managed to find a System that could guarantee lasting peace on earth. So far, people have made many significant errors as regards war. The time has come to reach some wise conclusions. As we examine the topic of wars (to see how many casualties and victims there were), we wil conclude that the topic of war is a very important one. (If there is still someone who does not understand it by now, they will surely understand once they are themselves affected by an armed conflict. The problem is that it may be too late then). In the part of the book devoted to wars, I have presented a new, reliable System, which will definitely guarantee stable, lasting peace on earth. (We would actually receive a warranty that it would be impossible to wage World Wars and other major armed conflicts). By way of an example, I am 100% sure that if we implemented my project regarding world peace – as described in my book – we would never again be faced with World War III! If anybody thinks it’s stupid, please examine the world history, e.g. shocking images that the society witnessed during World War II.
  Dear All, I guess you will think I have lost my mind. I know that at first sight, these words may seem too fantastic to be real. However, each person who reads the book will see that my ideas are most REALISTIC in the world. We are now facing a historic moment, when a process of introducing the greatest changes in the history of mankind is about to begin! To prove this fact I can reveal that this book shows the KEY to creating the New Order of the World! The New Order of the World is nothing less than TRUTH in a dose so large that mankind has never seen before! (It is not about the “New World Order” but about a “New Order of the World”! I wish the opponent of the “New World Order” support a “New Order of the World”).
 I would like to emphasize that the ideas I have come up with (both as regards wars and religion) are COMPLETELY NEW and have never been presented to the global society before. Our generation will be the first one to hear about brand new, unheard of solutions. (New ideas will also come as a surprise to the governing classes).
My ideas are not only ideas written down, but also ready materials, full of various written information, content, drawings, tables, graphs, symbols, guidelines etc., which will allow the global society to go straight to the execution of these projects in practice.
 I do realise it may seem strange that I have included 2 different topics in one book, but I would like to make it clear that there are 2 SEPARATE topics. (That’s why in my book I have placed them as two SEPARATE sections).
My goal is to make the new, true religion followed by as many people as possible. Please note that with such great religious changes all around the world, many people (especially some elites) may replay some occurrences from the past (and even from the present), reaching for the tool known as war. E.g. a group of people may persuade others to frighten, hurt or kill the followers of the new (or another) religion. I cannot let this happen, which is why I do not only call for “RELIGIOUS FREEDOM”, but I have also created a “RELIABLE SYSTEM”, WHICH WILL BE ABLE TO guarantee STABLE PEACE all around the world. (Of course, I have many other reasons for which I have included “wars” and “religion” in my book).
Everybody who manages to “Open their eyes” to the surrounding reality, will see for himself that my projects are no UTOPIA, but REALITY! This is mainly why I have titled my book “Open your Eyes”.
 The period of ten years (when I was writing this book) made me more and more convinced that I was completely right in everything I wrote and the time has come to start implementing the greatest changes in the history of mankind. The modern generation is now ready to see some new, important truths. I hope that each person who gets this book will “Open their eyes” and realise that “the world is no longer what it used to be”. (I also want to assure you that I am doing my best to make sure that the New Order of the World would be introduced in a PEACEFUL WAY). In order for you, not to be afraid of any threats that may arise in the process of creating the New Order of the World, I have decided to make it clear that in all my projects, I am ready to assume full responsibility for each single detail of my work. I am doing this because when writing this book, I was driven by such motivations as: truth, wisdom, goodness, justice and other precious values in human life. When creating my literary work, i did not have in mind my personal gain, but I did my best to do my job conscientiously, well, reliably, precisely and justly, considering the wellbeing of all the people in the world. There is no price in the world for which I would renounce the highest values. I personally advocate the protection of human rights and basic freedoms.
When promoting the religion (which I have created), I personally encourage people to respect one another’s decisions and to grant every man the right to religious freedom. [Religion is a private, personal matter and nobody has a right to force other people to change their views (be it religious, or atheistic, agnostic or other views)].
Summing up: It is very likely that thanks to this book, we will witness the greatest changes in the history of mankind. However, nobody should be afraid of any possible threat that could arise from the execution of my projects. For this reason, I keep making it clear to all the global society that each person has a right to choose (and to change one’s point of view with time). I want to guarantee COMPLETE FREEDOM to every person in the world! Each reader may “become the follower of the New Religion”, and at the same time, the same person may not accept the plan related to Wars as presented in my book, [or alternatively, they may not accept either of these ideas (or the other way round)]. Supporting my project means supporting the goal that is “publishing my book”. However when the book has reached the audience, then everybody can decide for themselves as regards topics such as religion and world peace.
 I knew perfectly well that I was in for many negative comments. It is impossible to propose new things related to “war” and “religion” without encountering comments and publications that are not only opposed to the idea, but downright negative, wrong and even hateful attitudes and views, both towards my statements and toward myself. (I would like to say I have known people who said and published far worse things about me. However, with time, many of them changed their attitude and now strongly support my noble goals – for which I remain truly grateful). (I would like to thank very, very much to all those people who officially support me). However, (at this early stage) generally people only support me anonymously (declared waiting for the further development of the project...). They claim they are afraid to support my project officially. They are afraid of criticism (insulting, threatening, mocking...) from various people and institutions. They fear they might lose some benefits to which they already got used etc. Nevertheless, with all my heart, I would like to thank people who support me anonymously and I hope there will come a beautiful day when they will not have to hide their support for my ideas.
The possibility to speak and express one’s views is so important that even if it makes me sad to read insulting and hateful comments, at the same time I am glad to see the abovementioned value respected. The right to express one’s views in public is one of the most valuable elements in the society!
[(Get off the subject) I am extremely grateful to those who post comments on my websites, because thanks to this, more people can witness the discussion. It is very important that as many people as possible may follow the progress, if slight, even if they don’t participate in the discussion itself].
In the topic addressed, apart from various people expressing their opinions, there is also something called the TRUTH. As there is only ONE TRUTH, there is a chance we will discover this one truth after some time, after a constructive discussion. We will then accept it and confirm the existence of the same truth. Then, it is enough if we all support this truth together.
(Nobody will force you to pay money or read the book, or to offer a particular opinion. Everybody is free to decide for themselves. Everybody has a right to the freedom of thought and freedom of speech).
 You don’t need to be afraid that I would bore the readers with my statements such as: “Being a religious person will allow us all to avoid wars”, (etc.) – I want to mention that although the above remark is indeed wise, in my book I will show MANY OTHER, COMPLETELY DIFFERENT IDEAS! My ideas will not only include proposed THEORETICAL solution, but most of all PRACTICAL ONES!
I am absolutely convinced that the topics of religion and wars do not have to be boring, but can account for very interesting and wise literature, not seen so far by anyone in the world. These novelties will define new directions, which will probably attract a considerable part of the global society even at the moment. Literature has great impact on shaping human attitudes, that’s why my assumption was that the book must be full of basic values indispensable in the life of every human being. A list of advantages of the book “Open your Eyes” is extended to innumerable, noble borders, as this book to a great extent shows the key to creating the New Order of the World!
Many issues discussed in my book are beautiful, amusing and very IMPORTANT projects for all the people on our planet, because they will allow us to “find another way to continue the process of nations getting closer together and creating important shared values in order to be of use and benefit to everyone”.
Each detail of my book has been meticulously adjusted to modern trends, which are of interest to people of various nationalities, ages, interests, views and backgrounds. In each second of writing my literary work, I also took care of the unique, precious values for individuals and societies, which make this book something that NEEDS to exist.
Dear All, I need your help! The world needs your help! Future generations need your help! We all need all the help we can get!
 I can assure you that everything I wrote is not just a colourful advertisement full of fantasy, but a proposal rooted in the real, objective world and for many years now I have been fully convinced of the seriousness of this proposal. I strongly believe in the meaning and success of my plans and this is the only reason why I have dedicated so many years of work to this end. Each of my proposals has been created exclusively on the foundations of TRUTH! It is the TRUTH that, in my opinion, is the most precious treasure in my book!
In my opinion, the book “Open your Eyes” may be a great success in the whole world, because the world has always been in need of such solutions! It is only now, in the 21st century that a hope appears that this noble goal shall be achieved. My literary work seems to bring about positive results already when you look at its theoretical assumptions, and it gives us hope that it will quickly become one of the great bestsellers in the realm of world literature! In my literature, apart from “great entertainment” and “various benefits”, you will also find “precious human values”. Once you make an in-depth analysis of my proposals, sooner or later will you conclude, that the world actually NEEDS THEM A LOT. – Does the humanity not need TRUTH as regards Religion? – Does the humanity not need PEACE in the whole world?
My intention is to CONVINCE THE SOCIETY OF THE WHOLE WORLD TO CREATE A NEW ORDER OF THE WORLD, WHERE EVERYBODY’S LIFE WOULD BE BETTER.
The literary work I want to present to you, is not a normal, common book, but it is: my MESSAGE. This is a LETTER addressed to all people in the world. This is a Description of New Systems. In this book I have described a VISION of the future world. This book is a “CALL to the mankind”. This book is an encouragement to the Greatest (Peaceful) Fight in the History of Mankind! This book is full of various ideas, which will open new opportunities to mankind! The solutions described in this book are the greatest chance that humanity has ever faced!
 Dear all, you will surely have noticed that nobody knows the details of my book as yet, but still they present negative attitude. I encourage PEACE IN THE WORLD! I encourage the TRUTH as the basis for the genuine religion! Unfortunately, these words seem empty nowadays, because they need to be supported with details – which have been described in the book. Please have some patience and consider whether it would be worth reading this (as the author claims, „exceptional”) book.
Even if the modern generation is not ready to create the New Order of the World, I hope that one day a generation will be born that will understand my words and introduce the New Order of the World following the guidelines presented in my book. Now I am heading for the great beginning, when I am still full of positive thoughts, faith, joy and hope.
I think that every minute of waiting for a decision is unnecessary, because all nations are waiting for those who are ready to offer something beneficial to mankind. Each nation in the world has its own rich history of making life beautiful for all the people on earth. I can assure you that projects related to my literary work will expand the great success not only for nation chosen by you, but for all the other nations in the world.
Everybody who becomes familiar with the total of the material included in my book will probably notice that the world is now facing serious challenges (in a very positive aspect of this phrase).
Regardless of the mode in which my ideas are implemented, the process of global changes has already been set in motion, so nobody will be able to stop it now. For the past few years I have worked and elaborated on every single detail, so that our generation may be ready to start the New Era!
I put my trust in you and I hope you will become interested in my book and soon it will be able to reach readers in the whole world. Your decision is extremely important, because it is not only about fulfilling my personal dreams, but most of all about using the chance that may bring benefits to the people in the whole world. (I am convinced you will all experience personal, individual success as well). If your decision concerning my proposal is positive, not only I myself, but also the society of the whole world will be able to rejoice and be grateful to you for your dedication. (Regardless of the final decision you make, you will soon understand that my words were not just an empty, pathetic advertisement of my own work).
My project needs a big support of society. However, at this initial stage, brave and clever people are needed to give a good example and encourage the others to continue this important way for achieving the noble goals. I cordially invite everyone to cooperate! I am immensely grateful to those who believe in and support this historic project! Dear All, be strong and don’t give up! Do not fear! 
 Thank you very much for your support and your help necessary to achieve the noble goals. 
 I wish you further success and luck in making the decision on this important matter.
 Below I will present you with a couple of quotes from the introduction and conclusion to the book:
Introduction to the book: “Open your Eyes”
I used to have a great dream, but I knew dreams hardly ever come true. Years went by, until I finally said “ENOUGH”! At this special moment I decided that my dreams will leave the sphere of fantasy and will be transferred to the REAL world.
- What dream am I specifically writing about? (I must warn you that after the first sentence you may think I have lost my mind).
My dream was: “I would like to change the world”!
- I would like to convince the society in the whole world to introduce the greatest changes in the history of mankind!
- I would just like to change the world for the better!
- I would like you and me, and all the people to have a better life on earth!
- I would like us all together to create the New Order of the World!
Unrealistic as it may sound, I would like my dream to remain real from now on. My dreams include all people. My desires are as follows:
- To finally have a New, TRUE Religion in this world, which will be followed by a large part of people in the world (and with time, it is hoped that all the people on earth will become the followers of this religion).
- For the peace to rule the world, so that we finally receive a real guarantee that it would be impossible to start World Wars (as well as other major armed conflicts).
- Do you think I am joking? Or maybe you believe you are now holding a fantasy novel?
- NO, NO!
- I am one hundred per cent SERIOUS!
My dear, I have had enough of illusion and disappointment! I want visible changes, and I want them NOW! Thousands of years have passed by and what? AND NOTHING! “Various religions keep dividing people” - none of them being true - and “wars are being waged every so often”!
I don’t want to wait one minute longer! I don’t want to die leaving this world as it is now. I don’t want anyone to have to wait and I don’t want next generations to wait in the hope that someday something may change to the better. I refuse to live in silence and die satisfied that I have done whatever I could, without actually doing anything! Until this world gets rid of its greatest problems so far as well as the most serious falsehoods, I will keep blaming myself for this wrong status quo!
I hope once you have finished reading this book, the World will no longer seem the same to you. I hope this book will strongly shake all the people and wake them up! I hope this book will shake all the world! I hope the society of the whole world will soon become united in certain topics and announce that: They support the Image of the New Order of the World (proposed in this book). I hope that some solutions and names, yet unknown (as well as many, names, symbols and ceremonies), will soon become a sort of special bond, not only personal, but also social. I hope that once you have read my literary work, you will personally contribute to creating the New Order of the World. I hope this world will soon change forever. I hope that each person who opens this book (and reads it to the end) will: “Open their Eyes” and realise we are facing one of the greatest opportunities mankind has ever seen!
(If you are afraid that this book may be too shocking for you, I can assure you that it would be far more shocking to realise that so far you did not know these important truths)!
Nobody knows the last century of mankind, but if human life were to end on this planet today after a few thousand years, I would have to admit with sadness and shame that as a whole global society, we have not only failed to address the greatest problems of mankind, but we have often disregarded something as precious as truth!
Many truths that originated on earth found it hard to survive at the beginning and I am afraid that the truth contained in this book may be in for a similar fate (at least initially). This is usually the way with truth that before it becomes popular, there are not many honest, wise, responsible and brave people ready to support the truth.
………….. (this is continued in the book)
 I have decided to change a lot of what was considered PERFECT by a large part of the global community for thousands of years!
I thought: - Why would I withdraw and be a coward, when all the world could benefit from it?!
Since then, since I “Opened my Eyes”, the world has never been the same to me. Since then I have perceived the world with a great hope that one day humanity will take a similar step and follow the truth, just like I did.
“I opened my eyes” and promised myself that: - I will never again close my eyes to certain significant truths.
Dear all, wishing well to all human beings, I only wanted each of us to Open our Eyes to the truth encountered in the world around us. That’s why I titled this book “OPEN YOUR EYES”.
Every evening, before I go to sleep, I think: - What a pity. Another day has passed and nobody could become familiar with my book”. Each morning, I wake up and think: - Will there be a breakthrough today? Will the book „Open Your Eyes” soon be available to anyone who wants it?
My dears, DO NOT BE AFRAID OF TRUTH! Do not be afraid of what is good, because the good is needed both to our generation and any future generations!
 There are many scenarios for commencing the process of introducing the New Order of the World. Regardless of the manner of implementing my ideas, the process of global changes has already been INITIATED; that’s why nobody will be able to stop it right now.
Today, nobody will be able to imagine how much goodness will come from this great truth presented in this book, although at this point this truth may still be unaccepted and unwelcome by a large part of the society. One day the people will understand that this was inevitable. Putting it off for much longer wouldn’t do us any good. In this scenario, we would actually exacerbate the situation in the world, because what needs to be changed in many areas of the world threatens the stability, safety and peace of all of us! Humanity still don’t know certain IMPORTANT TRUTHS!
Dear all, I......... had to do it ........ If it were not me, someone else would have done it. Maybe it would have been you, maybe your grandchildren, maybe someone in a few thousand years, but the fact is that sooner or later somebody would do it anyway. Truth will be revealed sooner or later, even the truth I am going to describe, which was lost or hidden from people for thousands of years!
What I want to tell to the whole world today will end the old, familiar Era in which humanity has lived for thousands of years. It will open a brand New Era in which future generations will want to live.
 Final speech
Dear all, nothing will be changed of its own accord. I cannot change the world without your help. I need your help! I need all of you! We all need the help of all the other people!
This book is only a seed of certain thoughts of mine, which I have planted in fertile soil. This seed will only grow when a large part of society takes good care of it. This seed will produce crops only when it is provided with proper conditions for living, and protected from those who want to pluck it out and destroy it. My dear friends, let us protect the planted seeds, and the sowers who sow them. Let us protect the people who support the sowers, and the earth that shields the seeds. But most significantly, we must …….(this is continued in the book).
I hope that once we begin the greatest fight in the history of mankind, we will manage to introduce the New Order of the World! In order to be able to enjoy the victory, I encourage all the people on this planet to become united as we have never been before! If we stay together in these hard moments of Global Changes, in order to achieve a common goal, then I believe we can change the history and accomplish something that no previous generation has achieved before! Let us support one another in the name of the highest values!
This greatest fight in the history of mankind will be the fight for TRUTH! This will be a fight for better future not only for the present generation, but also for all the future generations! This is the FIGHT FOR THE NEW ERA! No previous generation has even manager to win this Fight! Dear all, do you realise WHY nobody has yet won this fight in the history of mankind? The answer is easy: – Because nobody has even STARTED THIS FIGHT! This fight starts with the following words: “OPEN YOUR EYES” !
PS. (I also want to assure you that I am doing my best to make sure that the New Order of the World would be introduced in a PEACEFUL WAY).
The End
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
In case of a successful money collection, I see no obstacles to fulfil all of my promises. (Even in case of a failure to collect money, I have some plans to reward with time all those people who have supported my project in any manner).

 My wish is that the message I reveal on the 2,000 pages of the literary piece could reach the largest possible number of people. On that occasion, I request for supporting the project of publishing my book. 
 [The record amount of money (£1,000,000) I asked for is supposed to draw attention of the largest possible part of the society to the project and to help achieve the noble aim.
$ 500,000 for Project Backers.
$ 200,000 for “One More Chance” Project (for Project Backers and Project Creators).
$150,000 will be assigned to awards].
 I want to contribute my own money to pursue the noble goals for the benefit of the society, rather than make money on it. (For me there are more important values than financial ones). If I have more money in the future, I will happily (even more) support right causes with my funds. 
 It’s not of utmost importance “how much money you will collect”, but „what you do with the money”. (Besides, there is also another form of support, because money itself is not the most important).

 I request everybody who can afford it to pay at least $1 (£1) for that noble project. Otherwise, please express your willingness to read the book on one of my Websites. I hope that in case I will not be able to obtain financial support there will still be some hope that one of the publishing houses will get interested in printing my book seeing the high interest among the potential readers.

 Just in case, I have prepared some other scenarios. One of the interesting solutions is the possibility of publishing my book in the Web in the form of an e-book – an electronic version of the book for everybody to download it for free. (I would like to translate the literary piece in many languages of the world). Therefore, I would like to ask all translators in the world to engage in the translation of at least some part of my book to another language. “Open Your Eyes” has nearly 2000 pages, so please specify how much of the text you would be able to translate for free and in what language pair. (For example one person may agree to translate only one page of the book, but I will be requesting for reading many other pages of the selected text to understand the subject well). Additionally I would be grateful for stating your competencies when expressing your good will, as I care for the book to be translated at the highest possible level. (This means that not all translators will be able to translate the book and, of course, every translator will be free to resign from the assumed job at any time). The name of each translator will be provided under the translated text and as a reward, next to the name they will be able to print the address of their Website or other contact details (all in very small font for the book to keep its due high quality).
 [This idea may also prove useful in traditionally printed paper books, specifically because there are many people who refuse to read electronic books].


 Summing up, the support of the project does not have to be “financial”. It is enough when you pass the information about this important social project to other people or support it in another way. (However, the simplest and fastest way to arrive at printing a book is assigning of a certain amount of money for that purpose).
 As I mentioned earlier, among all my plans, there is also the possibility to upload my book on the Internet, so that everybody can download it for free. There are some obstacles, though, e.g. how do I encourage a few hundred translators to translate my book for free into various languages?! Where do I get the money to set up and maintain offices with teams of people to help me pursue noble goals in various parts of the world? Where do I get the money to help people in need?
 (If I am ever able to afford it, I will see to it that many people who don’t have the money to purchase my book can receive it for free).

 
 I promise that as time passes, I will reveal more and more of the content included in my book. However, at the beginning, my main goal is to make people want to read my book – and of course, I keep working towards overcoming any difficulties and obstacles on my way to publishing my book.
 I gather that many of you would already like to know some bigger details of my
book. However, I would like to emphasise that in this special case it is not only the matter of publishing the book, but mainly about the introduction of the New Order of the World. I am deeply convinced that everyone who reads my book will readily understand that for the benefit and wellbeing of the people on earth, I cannot disclose the details of my book yet. (At the same time, I want to assure you that every person searching for truth will probably agree with the ideas included in the book).
 If I were to disclose the details of my 2,000-page book, you can probably imagine how many complex and broad issues I would need to present, so that people can understand the meaning of certain novelties, previously unheard of. If we were to add the fact that I am going to encourage people to introduce immense changes in the world, it will be easier for you to understand why I could not divulge the detailed description of the book at the moment. (I need to share much more information with people at a time, and this information has been included in my book). 
 Let me add that many people working for the publishers told me that if I ever make a mistake and reveal more about my book, no publisher in the world will ever want to publish my book. (Let me remind you that one of my plans is to find a publisher to publish my book). 
 I intend to publish the book “Open Your Eyes” in many countries around the world. I would like my literary work to be translated into many different languages and printed in a great number of copies. As soon as the full amount is gathered, I will announce a sort of a tender, where the best companies and individuals will be selected to execute the described project in particular fields. The donors’ money will mainly be spent to this end. I would also like to add that it is my wish for the large part of the money made on the sales of the book to be spent, in the years and centuries to come, on printing more copies. (I cannot rule out the possibility of electronic publications - e-books).
 I would like to remind you that it is not only about publishing the book itself – the main purpose is to introduce the New Order of the World. For this reason, I would also like to establish an office, where the employees will be ordering the subjects related to my plans and wishes for the global society; they will also be collecting and sharing the information with the whole world, etc.
 I want quick, effective and speedy changes to be introduced in the world! I don’t want to limit myself to informing others of noble goals addressed only at a narrow social group. I want to address the society of the whole world! (But pursuing this goal involves higher costs). 

 I will always remember everybody who supports my noble project without expecting any gains (in the form of a charity) and will try to reward their efforts also in a financial manner. (However, the best reward is the very awareness that so much good has been done to the society, including future generations). In case of your positive decision, not only me but also the world’s society will be glad and will thank you for your efforts.

 I wish to clearly emphasise that describing this largest project in the history of mankind, my major objective is not my private advantage but the common good of the whole world’s society!
 I want you to trust me that the book titled “Open Your Eyes” is needed in the world. Believe me that the world could become a better place if the people reached for this book. Be patient and wait until the book is published and trust me that the book is worth reading by each inhabitant of the planet Earth.
 Dear All, we still have a chance to achieve historic success quite soon!
 I want to thank all those who don’t lose hope! (I will never lose it).

(It is obvious that many people will initially not like my project, but it will be even worse if they never get to know about the existence of this project). 
Unfortunately, I don’t have the money, so I haven’t spent even one dollar in order for some company to advertise my project. I have a great favour to ask of you, namely that each of us, on their own, should inform the society of the existence of this greatest project in the history of mankind!

By supporting my project, each of you can contribute to something great, which will significantly impact the course of our history.

campaign.story:
Angel
This is a story from the time God made Adam and Eve and the real story about how Lucifer came to Love Eve and be betrayed by another angle so that angle could have god open the doors to Earth and he could rule this realm. But this isn’t your every day run of the mill story about God vs Lucifer but how after Lucifer is free from hell and made to walk alongside man in the year 2060. For His wings were given to witches to turn their energy into something hidden in plain sight from Lucifer. For if he did get them back and found out who made the universe think he was the one that went agents his own father, that angle would meet the Devil had made. Siya is a young Orphan from Villas, NJ who tries to find her place in the world as a Photographer in Phila, PA. When an old memory has her looking for a man she meet in a dream realm many years ago. She learn about the dark world of demons and angel's right here in the city. As she starts digging she starts to learn her role in freeing Lucifer onto our world. Or will those that set Lucifer up find her first? A whole new kind of war would break loose onto our world. You won’t know anything even when you think you have it all figured out.

campaign.story:
Skelos Press is proud to announce the launch of its new flagship journal with a Kickstarter campaign that will begin on Tuesday May 10th. The first issue of SKELOS: THE JOURNAL OF WEIRD FICTION AND DARK FANTASY will feature a never-before-published fantasy piece by Robert E. Howard (Conan, Kull, Solomon Kane) illustrated by the legendary Mark Schultz (Xenozoic Tales, Coming of Conan, Prince Valiant). Also featured is a new sword and sorcery novelette by Keith Taylor (Bard series, Cormac Mac Art), a long-awaited sequel to his classic tale "Men from the Plain of Lir" originally published in WEIRD TALES. This story will be illustrated by the fantastic Tomás Giorello (Dark Horse King Conan). Another highlight of the issue will be a tale of dark fantasy from World Fantasy Award nominee and John W. Campbell Award nominee Scott A. Cupp.
.
SKELOS is edited by Mark Finn, author of the World Fantasy Award-nominated BLOOD AND THUNDER; Chris Gruber, editor of Robert E. Howard's BOXING STORIES from the University of Nebraska Press; and Jeffrey Shanks, co-editor of the Bram Stoker Award-nominated UNIQUE LEGACY OF WEIRD TALES.
"I'm excited to be part of the editorial staff for this journal. We are finding and publishing material that we love to read, and read about. There's a long-standing tradition to weird fiction, and we think we can contribute something new and exciting to it." -- Mark Finn, Editor
The first issue will contain short fiction from such talented writers as Charles Gramlich, Dave Hardy, Jason Ray Carney, Ethan Nahte, Scott Hannan, and Matt Sullivan; a fully illustrated adaptation of Grettir and the Draugr from the Icelandic sagas by Samuel Dillon; weird verse by K. A. Opperman, Ashley Dioses, Frank Coffman, Pat Calhoun, Kenneth Bykerk, and Jason Hardy; Insightful essays by Nicole Emmelhainz, Karen Kohoutek, and Jeffrey Shanks; reviews by Charles Hoffman, Bobby Derie, Keith West, Todd Vick, Paul McNamee, Brian Murphy, Deuce Richardson, and Josh Adkins; and with illustrations by Mark Schultz, Tomás Giorello, Samuel Dillon, and David Cullen.
Our plan is to make Skelos the framework for a community of like minded fans, writers, artists, and scholars that love horror fantasy and weird fiction. This Kickstarter is only the beginning! 
Shipping 
Please view the table below for shipping charges. You can add the appropriate shipping cost to your pledge amount or you can wait and be billed for shipping when the issues are ready to mail. Thanks!
   During the Kickstarter we will also make available for purchase as add-ons some of the original art from the first issue of the journal. Watch the updates for more details!
  The base funding goal of $2000 covers the costs of issue one. This includes payment to the contributors, costs of editing and layout, and overhead expenses. We are already gearing up for our second issue which will be out later this fall. For future issues we want to add more artwork and improved content so there will be slight cost increases. If we meet our first stretch goal of $4500 then issue two will be fully funded. At $8000 issue three is funded More stretch goals may be added as the campaign gets under way!
   If you would like to add print or digital additional copies simply increase the amount of your pledge to the appropriate amount. You will be surveyed after the Kickstarter ends to confirm and finalize your order.
We are also offering advertising space to our backers. Ads will appear in the print and PDF editions and in the mobi and epub editionas as formatting permits. All ads must meet formatting requirements which will be provided at the end of the Kickstarter.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
The first issue is completed, with only some last minute layout and art to be added. So there is little to no risk for backers of the first issue. 

We are already assembling material for the second issue and should have no problems having it ready for our target publication window of Fall 2016. So again this is little or no risk for those backing the subscription options.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

The print edition of Skelos 4 will be shipping soon. If you are receiving issue 4 as part of your pledge but did NOT prepay for shipping then you should have received a shipping invoice today from PayPal. If you did not receive it, the please check your spam folder first, then contact us at .

We know this has been a long wait, but I think you will find this issue was worth!

updates.update_userinfo: Skelos is Back from the Dead!!!
updates.update_content: Skelos: The Journal of Weird Fiction and Dark Fantasy returns with its long-awaited fourth issue. And what a return it is! In a special tribute to legendary late Texas author Bill Crider we present one of his pulpiest and wildest adventure tales. Bill Willingham, award-winning creator of Fables, makes his Skelos debut with an illustrated fantasy yarn. Adrian Cole delves back into antediluvian times with a full-length novelette featuring Henry Kuttner's Elak of Atlantis. Peter Rawlik takes us through the Gates of the Silver Key with a Lovecraftian sword-and-planet story. Charles R. Rutledge's occult detective Carter Decamp investigates the pages of Skelos for the first time. Milton J. Davis returns with the first installment of a multipart sword-and-soul novelette. Cynthia Ward invites us to dwell amidst wonder and glory for ever in the depths of the Pacific. Chris Gruber concludes his bloody, gripping weird western novella.

This proof-of-life photo was taken last week from a triad of secret bunkers. Clockwise from Left: Chris Gruber, Mark Finn, and Jeff Shanks.
The Subject: SKELOS #4, back from the dead!

updates.update_content:
Skelos 3 is finally ready to ship and will start going out to contributors and KS backers that prepaid for shipping. If you did not prepay for shipping, you will be receiving a Paypal invoice in your email in the next day or two. Keep an eye out for it.
We are planning to turn and burn on issue 4 and we'll have an update on it very soon!

updates.update_userinfo: Issue 2 Ebooks are Ready and Preview of Issue 3
updates.update_content:
Issue 2 Ebooks and Corrected Version
Fellow Skelo-Tens! This is an update that is a long time coming. As many of you know, issue 2 went to print with an early version of the manuscript that still contained a few typos. That has been corrected and it is now available again on all the usual online vendors. We have also completed the ebook versions of issue 2 with the corrections made. We will be sending out the download links to everyone who ordered issue 2, including those who only ordered the print version – call it a fancy errata sheet.
Editorial Changes

It has come to our attention that an error in our production process led to a version of issue 2 that was not the final draft being sent to the printer. This resulted in a number of typographical errors in the final product that should not have been present. We are temporarily pulling issue 2 from online retail venues until we have a corrected version available. We apologize profusely to our backers who have already received copies with the errors present and to our contributors whose work was not published in the best state it could have been. We have already taken steps to improve our editorial process on issue 3 to make sure that this will not happen again. We are also increasing our editorial staff to further enhance our quality control. We want to meet the high standards that you, our backers and supporters, expect and we will do everything we can to meet that goal. Thanks for your patience, understanding, and as always your support.

updates.update_userinfo: It's Here! It's Here! The New SKELOS is Here!

updates.update_content:
We've been going through the proof copies and making some minor tweaks and corrections and we are now ready to start shipping Issue 2. Copies will start winging their way to backers next week. We're going to jump right into issue 3 and get back on our original publishing schedule. 
In the meantime you might want to check out the latest Skelos Press book project -- Chicken Fried Cthulhu -- Featuring Joe R. Lansdale, Nancy Collins and many more!
